spoon bender.name: Spoon Bender
spoon bender.description:
Grants homing tears.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Rag Mega.

my reflection.name: My Reflection
my reflection.description:
+1.5 damage.
×2 range multiplier.
+1.5 range.
×1.6 shot speed multiplier.
-1 luck.
Makes Isaac's tears pull back to his direction after traveling a short distance.

number one.name: Number One
number one.description:
+1.5 tears.
-1.5 range.
×0.8 range multiplier.
Tears turn yellow and are fired from Isaac's lower body rather than his head.

the inner eye.name: The Inner Eye
the inner eye.description:
×0.51 fire rate multiplier.
Isaac fires a spread of 3 tears at once.

magic mushroom.name: Magic Mushroom
magic mushroom.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.3 damage.
×1.5 damage multiplier.
+2.5 range.
+0.3 speed.
Increases Isaac's size by +25% without affecting his hitbox.
Fully heals Isaac.
Can very rarely drop when destroying mushrooms.

1up.name: 1up!
1up.description:
+1 extra life.
Grants a familiar that follows Isaac.
Respawns Isaac with full health in the previous room, or half a soul heart if he has no red heart containers.
The item is removed from Isaac's inventory after it respawns Isaac.

skatole.name: Skatole
skatole.description:
Causes some fly enemies to transform into neutral flies that deal no damage: Attack Fly, Dart Fly, Eternal Fly, Ring Fly, Army Fly and Swarm.
Causes the following flies to move slower and deal no contact damage: Moter, Level 2 Fly, Bulb, Mama Fly, Bloodfly, Ultra Famine Fly and Ultra Pestilence Fly.
Prevents Pooters and Super Pooters from shooting and makes them slower, prevents Moters from splitting and Bulbs from draining energy.
The following flies move slower and deal no contact damage, but can still damage Isaac through other means: Full Fly, Boom Fly, Red Boom Fly, Drowned Boom Fly, Sucker, Soul Sucker, Split, Ink, Willo, Level 2 Willo, Dragon Fly, Dragon Fly X, Bone Fly, Sick Boom Fly, Tainted Boom Fly and Tainted Sucker.
Can be obtained as a final reward from a Shell Game .

halo of flies.name: Halo of Flies
halo of flies.description:
Spawns 2 Pretty Flies that block enemy shots.
These flies will instantly kill some fly enemies upon contact.
No more than 3 Pretty Flies can be obtained at a time.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Duke of Flies.

brother bobby.name: Brother Bobby
brother bobby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and shoots tears that deal 3.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.88 times per second.

the virus.name: The Virus
the virus.description:
+0.2 speed.
Inflicts poison on enemies who make contact with Isaac.
The poison lasts for 6-7 ticks and deals damage equal to 0.2 × HeartContainers ^ 2 + 2 . The poison can be continuously applied to bossses which normally are immune to status effects for a brief time after being inflicted with one.
Makes Isaac deal 24 contact damage per tick on top of applying poison (48 damage per second).
Can be dropped from the Lust mini-boss.

raw liver.name: Raw Liver
raw liver.description:
+2 Red Heart containers.
Fully heals Isaac.

a dollar.name: A Dollar
a dollar.description:
+100¢.
Can only be dropped as a final reward from a Slot Machine .

the compass.name: The Compass
the compass.description:
Shows the icons of all special rooms on the map, excluding secret rooms.
Reveals if Greed / Super Greed has replaced the shop or a secret room by displaying a mini-boss icon instead of the normal one.
Its effects appear as an icon next to the map.

lunch.name: Lunch
lunch.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 red heart container.

dinner.name: Dinner
dinner.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 red heart container.

dessert.name: Dessert
dessert.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 red heart container.

mom s underwear.name: Mom's Underwear
mom s underwear.description:
On pickup Spawns 3-6 Blue Flies upon pickup.
While held +2.5 range.

rotten meat.name: Rotten Meat
rotten meat.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 red heart container.
Can drop from destroying polyps in Corpse.

breakfast.name: Breakfast
breakfast.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 red heart container.
Can spawn once the Treasure Room item pool has been exhausted. When other pools are exhausted, they will use the Treasure Room item pool.

mom s heels.name: Mom's Heels
mom s heels.description:
+2.5 range.
Makes Isaac deal 12 contact damage per tick (24 damage per second).

mom s lipstick.name: Mom's Lipstick
mom s lipstick.description:
On pickup Spawns a random heart.
While held +3.75 range.

the book of belial.name: The Book of Belial
the book of belial.description:
While held +12.5% chance for a devil/angel deal.
On use +2 damage for the current room.
Multiple uses will only add +1 damage.
Passive variant 
If Judas or Black Judas obtain Birthright , they receive a special variation of The Book of Belial that can be held alongside another active item, similar to Book of Virtues . This variant synergizes differently with certain active items. For more details, check the synergies section on active item pages.
The special variant won't always grant +2 damage on use, but will instead use a formula for calculating the damage: NumberOfCharges × 0.66 .
The above formula will result in +2 damage for active items with 3 charges, just like The Book of Belial itself.
Timed-charge items and items with no charges will not grant a damage bonus, unless they have a specific synergy.

the necronomicon.name: The Necronomicon
the necronomicon.description:
Deals 40 damage to everything in the room.
A Missing Page and Missing Page 2 each add +40 to the damage, stacking up to 120 in total.

the bible.name: The Bible
the bible.description:
Grants flight for the current room.
Instantly kills Mom, Mom's Heart, It Lives, including their alt path variants.
Instantly kills Isaac if used against Satan.

the poop.name: The Poop
the poop.description:
Spawns a poop pile where Isaac is currently standing.
Knocks back nearby enemies, enemy shots and pickups.
The poop pile may yield pickups like regular poop.
Can drop from destroying buckets in Dross.
Cannot be placed over obstacles (e.g. while flying), except for some examples such as Red Poop and Cobwebs which will remove the obstacles.
It can also be placed over retracted spikes which will remove them from the room.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Dingle.

tammy s head.name: Tammy's Head
tammy s head.description:
Shoots 10 tears in a circle around Isaac that retain Isaac's shot speed and tear modifiers.
Each tear does DamageStat + 25 damage.

mr boom.name: Mr. Boom
mr boom.description:
Places down a large bomb that deals 185 damage, identical to the ones spawned by Mr. Mega .
The bomb is compatible with all bomb modifiers.
Can drop by the Wrath mini-boss.

mom s bra.name: Mom's Bra
mom s bra.description: Petrifies all enemies in the room for 4 seconds.

mom s pad.name: Mom's Pad
mom s pad.description:
Inflicts fear to all enemies in the room for 5 seconds.
Spawns a Blue Fly.

kamikaze.name: Kamikaze!
kamikaze.description: Makes Isaac explode, damaging him for half a heart and dealing 185 damage to nearby enemies.

bob s rotten head.name: Bob's Rotten Head
bob s rotten head.description:
Grants a poison bomb above Isaac's head that can be thrown using the cardinal directions and explodes upon impact.
The explosion deals DamageStat + 185 damage and leaves behind a gas cloud that poisons enemies that come in contact with it.
The poison cloud deals 5 damage per tick (15 per second).
The bomb can slightly bounce off of walls before exploding.
Can drop from the Sloth mini-boss.

teleport.name: Teleport!
teleport.description:
Teleports Isaac to a random room.
It is possible to teleport to the Secret Room, Super Secret Room but not to the I AM ERROR room.
In the Mirrored World, it can additionally teleport to the Ultra Secret Room.

yum heart.name: Yum Heart
yum heart.description:
Heals one red heart container, or 2 if playing as Tainted Magdalene .
Heals co-op players for half a red heart.
Can be dropped from the Super Lust mini-boss.

doctor s remote.name: Doctor's Remote
doctor s remote.description:
Makes a large red crosshair appear on the ground that can be controlled by Isaac's shooting keys.
After approximately 2 seconds, a large missile strikes down on the crosshair, dealing 20x Isaac's damage.

lucky foot.name: Lucky Foot
lucky foot.description:
+1 luck.
Increases the chances of winning at Slot Machines , Shell Games , Fortune Telling Machines , and Confessionals .
Increases the chance of getting a room-clear reward.
Converts all negative pills into their positive counterparts, but does not identify them like PHD does.

cupid s arrow.name: Cupid's Arrow
cupid s arrow.description: Grants piercing tears that travel through enemies.

shoop da whoop.name: Shoop da Whoop!
shoop da whoop.description:
Upon use, the next shot fired will be a large Brimstone -like laser in the direction Isaac is shooting at.
The laser deals 2x Isaac's damage and can hit enemies up to 13 times.
The laser inherits Isaac's tear effects.
Can be dropped by the Envy mini-boss.

steven.name: Steven
steven.description:
+1 damage.
Has a 16.6% chance to drop from the Steven boss.

pentagram.name: Pentagram
pentagram.description:
+1 damage.
+10% chance to spawn a devil/angel deal.

dr fetus.name: Dr. Fetus
dr fetus.description:
×0.4 fire rate multiplier.
Replaces Isaac's tears with bombs that explode after approximately 1 second after being fired.
Each bomb deals 10 times Isaac's damage. If this would lead to more than 60 damage, then the bombs instead deal 5 × DamageStat + 30 .
Bombs' size depends on tear size modifiers.
Bombs deal no knockback to each other.

magneto.name: Magneto
magneto.description:
Pickups are attracted to Isaac, even through pits and obstacles, excluding key blocks.
Hearts and batteries are only attracted when they are needed.
Nearby unlocked chests will open automatically, including spiked chests without damaging Isaac.

treasure map.name: Treasure Map
treasure map.description: Reveals the map layout without showing the icons.

mom s eye.name: Mom's Eye
mom s eye.description:
Gives Isaac a chance to simultaneously shoot a tear out of an eye on the back of his head.
The chance starts at 50% with 0 luck and goes up to 100% with 5 luck.

distant admiration.name: Distant Admiration
distant admiration.description: Spawns a red attack fly that circles around Isaac and deals 5 damage per tick (75 per second).

lemon mishap.name: Lemon Mishap
lemon mishap.description:
Creates a small pool of yellow creep that deals 8 damage per tick (24 per second) to enemies inside it.
The creep remains active until Isaac leaves the room.

book of shadows.name: Book of Shadows
book of shadows.description:
Creates a protective shield around Isaac, negating all types of damage in the room for 10 seconds.
Prevents damage from Blood Donation Machines , Devil Beggars , Hell Games , and Confessionals .
Does not prevent damage from IV Bag .

the ladder.name: The Ladder
the ladder.description:
Places a ladder across one-square gaps, allowing Isaac to walk over.
Enemies cannot walk over the ladder.

the battery.name: The Battery
the battery.description:
Allows active items to store an additional full level of charge.
Extra charges appear as yellow bars on top of the normal charge meter.

steam sale.name: Steam Sale
steam sale.description:
Cuts in half the price of all items that can be purchased with money.
Items that cost 15¢ are reduced to 7¢, while pickups that cost 5¢ are reduced to 3¢.
Picking up multiple copies of Steam Sale will further reduce the price, with each copy lowering prices less. The following formula is applied: price / (SteamSaleCopies + 1) .
Prevents shops from having natural discounts on top of the Steam Sale discount.
Can be dropped as a rare drop from shopkeepers, as well as from the Greed mini-boss, and from the Super Greed mini-boss before unlocking A Quarter .

charm of the vampire.name: Charm of the Vampire
charm of the vampire.description:
+0.3 damage.
Restores half a red heart for every 13 enemies killed.
Removes Isaac's reflection in the water.

the hourglass.name: The Hourglass
the hourglass.description: Slows down all enemies in the room for 8 seconds.

anarchist cookbook.name: Anarchist Cookbook
anarchist cookbook.description:
Spawns 6 Troll Bombs near the center of the room.
Bombs are affected by bomb modifiers.
Can drop from the Pride mini-boss.

sister maggy.name: Sister Maggy
sister maggy.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and shoots red tears that deal 6 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.

technology.name: Technology
technology.description:
Replaces Isaac's tears with a laser beam that has unlimited range and pierces through enemies.
The laser is fired from Isaac's left eye.

chocolate milk.name: Chocolate Milk
chocolate milk.description:
Isaac can hold down the shoot button to fire a more powerful tear depending on the charge.
Damage scales from 10% at minimum to 400% at full charge.
A higher tear stat can increase the minimum damage but decrease the maximum.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description:
+3 Soul Hearts.
+0.5 tears.
Adds 5 copies of The Bible to all item pools, unless it has previously been picked up.
The Bible can be found multiple times even in the same pool unless it is picked up, after which it is removed from everywhere.

cube of meat.name: Cube of Meat
cube of meat.description:
Spawns an orbital familiar which blocks shots and deals contact damage.
The familiar can be upgraded up to 4 times by obtaining additional Cubes of Meat. Each level has its own characteristics.
Level 1: Blocks projectiles and deals 7 damage per tick (52.5 per second).
Level 2: Gains the ability to shoot tears alongside Isaac, 1.36 times per second, that deal 3.5 damage.
Level 3: Transforms from an orbital to a follower that chases nearby enemies and deals 5 damage per tick (12.5 per second). Loses the ability to shoot tears and block shots.
Level 4: Increases the size of Meat Boy and now deals 10 damage per tick (25 per second).
Obtaining additional Cubes of Meat will create a new level 1 cube and start the cycle again.
Can drop after defeating a Harbinger.

mini mush.name: Mini Mush
mini mush.description:
+0.3 speed.
+1.5 range.
Reduces Isaac's size by 20%, and his hitbox by 36%.
Can very rarely drop when destroying mushrooms.

a quarter.name: A Quarter
a quarter.description:
+25¢.
Can drop from destroying urns or killing Super Greed.

x ray vision.name: X-Ray Vision
x ray vision.description: Permanently opens up Secret Room and Super Secret Room entrances.

phd.name: PHD
phd.description:
On pickup Heals 2 red hearts.
Spawns a random pill on the ground.
While held Identifies all pills upon pickup.
Converts negative pills into their positive counterparts or removes their negative effects.
Adds 0-2 coins to the payout every time a Blood Donation Machine or IV Bag is used.
In Hard Mode, adds exactly 1 coin to the payout.

my little unicorn.name: My Little Unicorn
my little unicorn.description:
Gives invulnerability and +0.28 speed for 6 seconds.
Isaac cannot shoot any tears while active, but can instead deal 20 damage per tick (40 per second).
Also speeds up the game's music.

book of revelations.name: Book of Revelations
book of revelations.description:
While held +17.5% devil/angel chance.
On use +1 Soul Heart.
Guarantees a Harbinger boss to replace the current floor's boss, if possible.
Only 1 Harbinger can spawn per chapter:
• Famine in Chapter 1.
• Pestilence in Chapter 2.
• War in Chapter 3.
• Death or Conquest (if unlocked) in Chapter 4.
• The Headless Horseman on any floor.
Does not affect bosses in alt path and final bosses.

dead cat.name: Dead Cat
dead cat.description:
+9 extra lives.
Grants a familiar that follows Isaac.
Sets Isaac's red heart containers to 1.
Does not remove Soul Hearts or Black Hearts unless picked up as a character that cannot use red hearts.
Does not remove Bone Hearts unless picked up as The Forgotten .
Upon death respawns Isaac in the previous room and sets his red heart containers to 1 again.
The item is removed from Isaac's inventory after it respawns Isaac 9 times.
Can drop from the Super Pride mini-boss.

we need to go deeper.name: We Need To Go Deeper!
we need to go deeper.description:
Spawns a trapdoor that leads to the next floor.
If used on a tile with a special graphic (e.g. grass, piece of garbage, etc), it will instead spawn a Crawl Space once per floor.
If used in Womb II, the trapdoor will always lead to Sheol.
Can only spawn a Crawl Space trapdoor if used in any floor after Womb. Regular trapdoors won't be spawned in these floors.
Can be used on a dirt patch in the Dark Room to get a random chest.

the nail.name: The Nail
the nail.description:
+1 Half Black Heart.
+2 damage.
-0.18 speed.
Grants the ability to destroy obstacles by walking into them.
Allows Isaac to deal 20 contact damage per tick (40 per second) to enemies.
Changes the color of Isaac's tears to red.
Isaac makes a demonic sound when taking damage in a room where the item was used.
If used multiple times in the same room, the speed penalty applies only once, but the damage bonus stacks.
All bonuses apply only for the current room.

deck of cards.name: Deck of Cards
deck of cards.description:
Gives Isaac a random card.
Has a rare chance to give Dice Shard or Cracked Key .

monstro s tooth.name: Monstro's Tooth
monstro s tooth.description:
Spawns a friendly Monstro that jumps onto a random enemy and deals 120 damage, while destroying nearby obstacles.
Can also damage Isaac and will target him if used in a room with no enemies.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Monstro.

loki s horns.name: Loki's Horns
loki s horns.description:
Adds a chance to shoot tears in 4 cardinal directions.
The chance starts at 25% with 0 luck and goes up to 100% with 15 luck.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Loki.

little chubby.name: Little Chubby
little chubby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and charges across the room when Isaac shoots, dealing 3.5 damage per tick (105 per second) to any enemies in its path, until it hits a wall or obstacle.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Chub.

spider bite.name: Spider Bite
spider bite.description:
Adds a 25% chance to shoot slowing tears that reduce the movement speed of enemies and any projectiles fired by them.
The slowness lasts for 2.5 seconds.
The chance to fire a slowing tear goes up to 100% at 15 luck.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Triachnid.

the small rock.name: The Small Rock
the small rock.description:
+1 damage.
+0.2 tears.
-0.2 speed.
Has a small chance to drop when destroying a Tinted Rock.

spelunker hat.name: Spelunker Hat
spelunker hat.description:
Reveals map icons and layout up to 2 rooms from where Isaac is located.
Can also reveal Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.
Completely prevents damage from projectiles falling from above.

super bandage.name: Super Bandage
super bandage.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+2 Soul Hearts.
Heals 1 Red Heart container.

the gamekid.name: The Gamekid
the gamekid.description:
Turns Isaac into a Pac-Man-like creature for 6 seconds and provides the following effects:
Gives invulnerability.
Inflicts fear to all enemies in the room.
Removes the ability to shoot tears.
Allows Isaac to deal 20 contact damage per tick (40 per second).
Has a 50% chance to replenish half a red heart for every enemy that dies while active, even if not killed by Isaac.
Speeds up the game's music.

sack of pennies.name: Sack of Pennies
sack of pennies.description:
Spawns a sack familiar that follows Isaac around and drops a random coin every 2 rooms.
The first drop happens after 1 room.

robo baby.name: Robo-Baby
robo baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and shoots spectral Technology lasers that deal 3.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.

the relic.name: The Relic
the relic.description:
Spawns a small blue cross familiar that follows Isaac around and drops a Soul Heart every 8 rooms.
The first Soul Heart is dropped after 7 rooms.

little c h a d.name: Little C.H.A.D.
little c h a d.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drops a Half Red Heart every 3 rooms.
The first drop happens after 2 rooms.
Can drop when defeating C.H.A.D.

the book of sin.name: The Book of Sin
the book of sin.description:
Spawns a random pickup, pill, card or rune.
Cannot spawn Micro Batteries . Other battery types can spawn normally.

little gish.name: Little Gish
little gish.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires slowing tears that deal 3.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.
Can drop by defeating Gish.

little steven.name: Little Steven
little steven.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires homing tears that do 3.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.
Can drop by defeating Steven.

the halo.name: The Halo
the halo.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.3 damage.
+0.2 tears.
+1.5 range.
+0.3 speed.
Heals 1 red heart container.

the common cold.name: The Common Cold
the common cold.description:
Adds a chance to fire poison tears that deal damage over time when inflicted.
The poison hits enemies 2 times, dealing a total of 2x Isaac's damage.
The chance to fire a poison tear starts at 25% with 0 luck and maximizes at 100% with 12 luck.

the parasite.name: The Parasite
the parasite.description:
Upon impact with obstacles or enemies, tears split into 2 smaller tears with half damage and half range.
Only tears with damage greater than 1 are affected.

the d6.name: The D6
the d6.description: Rerolls every item in the current room into another item from the current room's item pool.

mr mega.name: Mr. Mega
mr mega.description:
+5 bombs.
Increases the damage and blast radius of Isaac's bombs. Damage is increased to 185.
Makes the screen shake after a bomb explodes.
Can drop from the Super Wrath mini-boss.

the pinking shears.name: The Pinking Shears
the pinking shears.description:
Separates Isaac's head from his body for the current room. Only the head will be under Isaac's control, which gains flight.
The body will seek out to enemies and deal 5.5 damage per tick (23.57 per second).
The body's speed is dependent on Isaac's speed stat.

the wafer.name: The Wafer
the wafer.description:
Reduces all damage taken to half a heart.
Giant champions that deal 2 full hearts of damage will instead deal only 1 full heart.

money power.name: Money = Power
money power.description: +0.04 damage for every penny Isaac has.

mom s contacts.name: Mom's Contacts
mom s contacts.description:
+1.5 range.
Adds a 20% chance to shoot petrifying tears that stop enemies in place and prevent them from moving or attacking for 1 second.
The activation rate goes up to around 50% with 20 luck.

the bean.name: The Bean
the bean.description:
Isaac farts, knocking back enemies and reflecting projectiles, making them deal damage to enemies.
The fart deals 5 damage and poisons any nearby enemies for 6 ticks. The poison deals damage equal to Isaac's.
The area of effect is 2.5 tiles in all directions.

guardian angel.name: Guardian Angel
guardian angel.description:
Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick (52.5 per second).
Increases the speed of all orbiting familiars.

mom s knife.name: Mom's Knife
mom s knife.description:
Replaces Isaac's tears with a knife that pierces through enemies and can travel through obstacles.
Holding down the fire button increases the knife's range and power.
The knife deals 2x Isaac's damage 20 times per second while held, and 6x Isaac's damage at about 1/3 full charge. Damage quickly drops to 2x Isaac's damage when returning regardless of charge. Further charging only increases the maximum range.
Can be fired diagonally by holding down 2 firing buttons at once.

demon baby.name: Demon Baby
demon baby.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and automatically fires at enemies in its range 3 times per second, dealing 3 damage per shot.

ouija board.name: Ouija Board
ouija board.description:
+0.5 tears.
Grants spectral tears that can travel through obstacles.

9 volt.name: 9 Volt
9 volt.description:
On pickup Fully charges Isaac's active item.
While held Grants 1 bar of charge when using any active item that has more than 1 bar of recharge time.
If the current active item has a recharge time of 1 bar, then it will be changed to a timed recharge of 15 seconds.
Recharging can happen only in a room with enemies.
Makes timed recharge items start at half charge, reducing their recharge time by 50%.

dead bird.name: Dead Bird
dead bird.description:
Taking damage summons a bird familiar that chases enemies for the remainder of the room.
The familiar deals 2 damage per tick (4.29 per second).
The familiar will remain active between rooms as long as Isaac has half or no Red Hearts (1 or less as Eve ).

brimstone.name: Brimstone
brimstone.description:
×0.33 fire rate multiplier.
Replaces Isaac's tears with a laser beam that must be charged.
The beam pierces through enemies and obstacles and has infinite range.
The beam deals damage equal to Isaac's damage each tick. Each shot deals damage for 9 ticks, resulting in a total of 9x Isaac's damage in about ~0.63 seconds.
Starting from 15 fire rate, the beam can last indefinitely as long as a fire button is held. Higher fire rates will result in higher damage per tick and a larger scale.
Acquiring a second copy of Brimstone grants ×1.2 damage multiplier and +1 damage. The width of the laser is doubled as well.
Any additional copies only grant +1 damage.

whore of babylon.name: Whore of Babylon
whore of babylon.description:
Whenever Isaac has half a red heart or less, he enters the Whore of Babylon state which grants the following effects:
+1.5 damage.
+0.3 speed.
The effect lasts for the remainder of the room after healing.
When playing as Eve , the effect will activate at one full red heart or less and will also increase her damage multiplier to ×1.

blood bag.name: Blood Bag
blood bag.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.3 speed.
Refills 4 red heart containers.
Can drop as a final payout from a Blood Donation Machine .

odd mushroom.name: Odd Mushroom
odd mushroom.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+1 damage.
+1.5 range.
-0.2 speed.
Makes Isaac's head larger, which on its own is only a visual effect. If taken when Isaac is smaller than the default, the Mushroom also increases his hitbox slightly.

dead sea scrolls.name: Dead Sea Scrolls
dead sea scrolls.description:
Activates a random active item effect from the following:
• Anarchist Cookbook 
• Best Friend 
• Bob's Rotten Head 
• The Book of Belial 
• Book of Revelations 
• Book of Shadows 
• The Book of Sin 
• Crack the Sky 
• Crystal Ball 
• Deck of Cards 
• Doctor's Remote 
• The Gamekid 
• The Hourglass 
• Lemon Mishap 
• Mom's Bottle of Pills 
• Mom's Bra 
• Mom's Pad 
• Monster Manual 
• Monstro's Tooth 
• Mr. Boom 
• My Little Unicorn 
• The Nail 
• The Necronomicon 
• The Pinking Shears 
• Prayer Card 
• Shoop da Whoop! 
• Spider Butt 
• Tammy's Head 
• Telepathy For Dummies 
• Teleport! 
• We Need To Go Deeper! 
• Yum Heart

monster manual.name: Monster Manual
monster manual.description:
Summons a random familiar for the remainder of the floor.
Only familiars that have the monstermanual tag can be summoned.

bobby bomb.name: Bobby-Bomb
bobby bomb.description:
+5 bombs.
Bombs gain a homing effect.

razor blade.name: Razor Blade
razor blade.description:
+1.2 damage for the current room.
-1 full red heart.
Subsequent uses in the same room will deal only half a heart of damage.

forget me now.name: Forget Me Now
forget me now.description:
Restarts and regenerates the current floor.
This counts as entering a new floor.

forever alone.name: Forever alone
forever alone.description:
Spawns a blue orbital fly that orbits a long distance from Isaac and deals 2 damage per tick (30 per second).
Can drop from the Super Envy mini-boss.

bucket of lard.name: Bucket of Lard
bucket of lard.description:
+2 full heart containers.
-0.2 speed.
Can drop from the Super Gluttony mini-boss.

a pony.name: A Pony
a pony.description:
While held Grants flight and sets Isaac's minimum speed to 1.5. The speed cannot go below this point as long as the item is held.
On use Isaac charges in the direction he's facing, gaining invincibility during the charge and dealing contact damage to enemies.
The dash deals 4 × DamageStat + 28 .
The dash can persist between multiple rooms if lined up correctly. This means it can be used to enter Curse Rooms for free.
The invincibility will not protect against Blood Donation Machines , Devil Beggars or similar self-sacrifice methods.
Can drop by defeating The Headless Horseman.

bomb bag.name: Bomb Bag
bomb bag.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drops a random type of bomb every 3 rooms.
The first drop happens after 2 rooms.

a lump of coal.name: A Lump of Coal
a lump of coal.description:
Tears gain a flat damage bonus of about +0.5-0.6 per tile of distance traveled, unaffected by other multipliers.
Can drop by defeating Krampus.

guppy s tail.name: Guppy's Tail
guppy s tail.description:
Grants a 33% chance of replacing room clear rewards with a Chest or a Locked Chest .
Grants a 22% chance to replace the room clear reward with nothing.
Due to these effects, keys become more scarce as they can often times be replaced with Locked Chests.

iv bag.name: IV Bag
iv bag.description:
Spawns coins on the cost of half a red heart (or a full heart starting from The Womb).
Each use pays out with 1-2 coins on Normal Mode or 1 coin on Hard Mode.
Spawns 0-1 coins instead when used by Keeper or Tainted Keeper .
Can drop as a final payout from a Blood Donation Machine .

best friend.name: Best Friend
best friend.description:
Spawns a decoy that distracts enemies and makes them target it instead of Isaac.
The decoy explodes after a few seconds, dealing 185 damage in a Megatroll Bomb radius.
The decoy is affected by some bomb modifiers.

remote detonator.name: Remote Detonator
remote detonator.description:
On pickup +5 bombs.
While held Bombs will no longer explode automatically.
On use Detonates all bombs currently placed in the room.
Cannot control Troll Bombs and Megatroll Bombs .

mom s purse.name: Mom's Purse
mom s purse.description:
Spawns a random trinket.
Allows 2 trinkets to be carried at once.

stigmata.name: Stigmata
stigmata.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.3 damage.
Refills 1 heart container.

bob s curse.name: Bob's Curse
bob s curse.description:
+5 bombs.
Grants bombs a poison effect, making them leave behind a lingering green poison cloud after exploding.
The poison cloud deals 5 damage per tick (15 per second).
Makes Isaac immune to poison effects such as gas clouds from destroying Mushrooms or Sick Boom Flies.
Can drop from the Super Sloth mini-boss.

scapular.name: Scapular
scapular.description:
Once per room, when Isaac is down to his last half heart, he gains a soul heart.
Re-entering the room allows for the effect to be triggered again.
Cannot be triggered by self-sacrifice methods such as Blood Donation Machines or Devil Beggars .

pageant boy.name: Pageant Boy
pageant boy.description: Spawns 7 random coins and a random penny trinket.

bum friend.name: Bum Friend
bum friend.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and picks up coins from the ground.
The familiar will drop a random pickup after collecting 6 coins.
After the initial drop, Bum Friend has a 67% chance to drop a pickup after collecting 3 coins, and a 33% chance to drop after 4 coins.
Has an additional chance to drop batteries and items from the Beggar item pool.
He cannot pick up Sticky Nickels .
He can drop one of the following: red heart, bomb, key, card/rune, pill or a trinket.

notched axe.name: Notched Axe
notched axe.description:
When used, replaces Isaac's tears with a pickaxe that can be swung like The Forgotten 's club.
It can damage enemies, break obstacles and blow open doors.
Using the item again holsters the pickaxe and allows Isaac to shoot tears again. This can be done repeatedly without wasting any charges.
The item has a total of 64 charges and cannot be recharged normally by clearing rooms or picking up batteries or battery-related items. It will fully recharge upon going down to a next floor or picking up Iron Bar .
Each swing deals 3x Isaac's damage and depletes 2 charges.
Destroying an obstacle or blowing open a door depletes 1 charge.
Once the item runs out of charges, the pickaxe breaks and cannot be used again until recharged.

ipecac.name: Ipecac
ipecac.description:
+40 flat damage.
×0.33 fire rate multiplier.
×0.8 range multiplier.
×0.8 shot speed multiplier.
×0.4 tear size multiplier.
Isaac's tears become explosive and are fired in an arc.
Enemies within the blast radius become poisoned.
Damage multipliers do not affect Ipecac's flat damage bonus.
Ipecac shots deal half a heart of self-damage, and a full heart with 85 or a higher damage stat.
The poison deals damage equal to BaseDamage + 2 , and ticks for a total of 2 times. The +40 flat damage does not apply to this formula.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.description:
Spawns 2-6 Blue Flies upon taking damage.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Husk.

the mulligan.name: The Mulligan
the mulligan.description: Tears have a 16% chance to spawn a Blue Fly when they hit an enemy.

tough love.name: Tough Love
tough love.description:
Adds a chance to shoot a tooth instead of a tear, that deals 3.2x Isaac's damage.
The chance for a tooth shot starts at 10% with 0 luck, and maximizes at 100% with 9 luck.

technology 2.name: Technology 2
technology 2.description:
×0.66 fire rate multiplier.
Replaces the tears fired from Isaac's right eye with a piercing laser with unlimited range that fires continuously as long as a fire button is held.
The laser deals ~13% of Isaac's damage 15 times per second (~195% per second).
The laser can knock back enemies.

mutant spider.name: Mutant Spider
mutant spider.description:
×0.42 fire rate multiplier.
Isaac fires a spread of 4 tears at the same time.

chemical peel.name: Chemical Peel
chemical peel.description: +2 flat damage to tears fired from Isaac's left eye.

the peeper.name: The Peeper
the peeper.description:
×1.35 damage multiplier to tears fired from Isaac's left eye.
Spawns a familiar that floats diagonally across the room and bounces off of walls.
The familiar blocks enemy shots and deals 8 damage per tick (17.14 per second) to enemies it passes through.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Bloat.

habit.name: Habit
habit.description: Adds +1 charge to Isaac's active item upon taking damage.

crystal ball.name: Crystal Ball
crystal ball.description:
While held +15% Planetarium chance, or +100% if at least one Treasure Room has been skipped.
Even though it grants a 100% planetarium chance, it still cannot guarantee one to spawn due to some floor layouts not being capable of spawning one.
On use Reveals the floor layout and all map icons except the Super Secret Room.
50/50 chance to drop either a Soul Heart or a random card/rune.
Can drop as a final payout from a Fortune Telling Machine .

bloody lust.name: Bloody Lust
bloody lust.description:
Taking damage increases Isaac's damage stat for the remainder of the floor.
Damage is increased up to 6 times per floor, in the following manner: +0.5 for the first hit and an additional +0.2 for each hit, until +1.5 at the final hit.
The maximum total is +6 damage.

crack the sky.name: Crack the Sky
crack the sky.description:
Summons 5 beams of light that tend to directly target enemies.
Beams can hit the same enemy up to 8 times, dealing DamageStat + 20 damage per hit.
Each beam lasts for 0.8 seconds and has a 3x3 cross-shaped area of effect.

ankh.name: Ankh
ankh.description:
+1 extra life.
Upon death, respawns Isaac as ??? with 3 Soul Hearts in the most recent non-hostile room, and then removes the item.
If playing as Tainted ??? , will revive as that character instead.

celtic cross.name: Celtic Cross
celtic cross.description:
Taking damage has a chance to create a shield that negates all types of damage for 7 seconds, similarly to Book of Shadows .
The base chance is 20% and goes up to 100% with 27 luck.

ghost baby.name: Ghost Baby
ghost baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires spectral tears that deal 3.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.
Can drop by destroying a skull.

the candle.name: The Candle
the candle.description:
When used, Isaac raises the candle above his head. Pressing a fire button will shoot out a blue flame in the chosen direction.
The flame shrinks in size while traveling and disappears after 2 seconds.
The flame deals 23 to 11.5 damage per tick depending on its size, 6 times per second.
A single flame can deal a total of 160 damage.
The flame also destroys enemy shots and shopkeepers.
It can travel over pits, but not through obstacles.
The flame cannot hurt Isaac.

d20.name: D20
d20.description:
Rerolls all pickups and chests in the room.
Cannot reroll items into item pedestals.

harlequin baby.name: Harlequin Baby
harlequin baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires 2 tears at once in a V pattern which each deal 4 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Mr. Fred.

daddy longlegs.name: Daddy Longlegs
daddy longlegs.description:
Creates a shadow that follows Isaac around and causes Daddy Long Legs' foot to stomp on enemies every ~4 seconds.
Each stomp can hit an enemy twice for a total of 40 damage (20 per tick).
The foor stays down for about 1 second and can hit multiple enemies at once, including ones that come in contact with it while it's down.
The familiar prioritizes enemies with the most health first, and then target ones closest to Isaac.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Daddy Long Legs.

polyphemus.name: Polyphemus
polyphemus.description:
+4 flat damage.
×2 damage multiplier.
×0.42 fire rate multiplier.
When a tear kills an enemy, it continues to travel on with any leftover damage.

epic fetus.name: Epic Fetus
epic fetus.description:
Replaces Isaac's tears with guided missiles.
Pressing a fire button spawns a crosshair that can be controlled with the fire buttons, summoning a missile to its position 1.5 seconds later.
Each missile deals 20x Isaac's damage.
Missiles are affected by some bomb modifiers.
The speed of the crosshair is not affected by Isaac's shot speed.

spider butt.name: Spider Butt
spider butt.description:
Deals 10 damage to all enemies in the room and slows them down for 4 seconds.
Enemies killed by Spider Butt spawn 1-3 Blue Spiders.

sacrificial dagger.name: Sacrificial Dagger
sacrificial dagger.description:
Spawns a sideways dagger that orbits around Isaac, blocks shots and deals damage to enemies that come in contact with it.
The dagger deals 15 damage per tick (112.5 per second).

mitre.name: Mitre
mitre.description: Grants a 33% chance to convert any red heart drop into a Soul Heart .

rainbow baby.name: Rainbow Baby

stem cells.name: Stem Cells
stem cells.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.16 shot speed.
Heals 1 red heart container.

dad s key.name: Dad's Key

portable slot.name: Portable Slot
portable slot.description:
Has a chance to drop a random pickup, spawn a Neutral Fly, or grant a Pretty Fly , for the cost of 1¢.
Can be obtained via a Slot Machine .

holy water.name: Holy Water
holy water.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and launches itself while Isaac is shooting.
Upon hitting an enemy, the familiar deals 7 damage and shatters, creating a pool of damaging blue creep that petrifies enemies that come in contact with it.
The pool lasts for ~9 seconds and deals 8 damage per tick (24 per second).
Once the pool disappears completely, Holy Water will respawn and can be launched again.
It will not respawn immediately after entering a new room.

white pony.name: White Pony
white pony.description:
While held Grants flight and sets Isaac's minimum speed to 1.5. The speed cannot go below this point as long as the item is held.
On use Isaac charges in the direction he's facing, gaining invincibility during the charge and dealing contact damage to enemies while also creating beams of light behind him.
The dash deals DamageStat × 4 + 28 .
The dash can persist between multiple rooms if lined up correctly. This means it can be used to enter Curse Rooms for free.
The invincibility will not protect against Blood Donation Machines , Devil Beggars or similar self-sacrifice methods.
The beams of light deal DamageStat × 4 + 10 and trail behind him as he charges.
Can drop by defeating Conquest.

the black bean.name: The Black Bean
the black bean.description:
Taking damage causes Isaac to fart 5 times in quick succession, knocking back and dealing poison damage to nearby enemies.
The farts deals 5 damage and the poison deals 6x Isaac's damage for 6 ticks.

sacred heart.name: Sacred Heart
sacred heart.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
x2.3 damage multiplier.
+1 flat damage.
-0.4 tears.
-0.25 shot speed.
Fully heals Isaac.
Grants homing tears.

holy grail.name: Holy Grail
holy grail.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 red heart container.
Grants flight.

blood rights.name: Blood Rights
blood rights.description:
+0.48 fire rate for the current room when used for the first time on a stage.
Deals a full heart of damage and activates The Necronomicon effect, dealing 40 damage to all enemies in the room.
Deals only half a heart of damage after the first use in the same room, and adds only +0.15 fire rate for the current stage bonus.
Prioritizes red hearts.
Bypasses boss armor.

guppy s hairball.name: Guppy's Hairball
guppy s hairball.description:
Spawns a hairball familiar that loosely follows behind Isaac.
The familiar can block shots and be swung to damage enemies, dealing 5 damage per tick (21.43 per second).
Each time it kills an enemy, it grows in size and its damage increases by +2. It can grow up to 5 times, for a maximum of 13 damage per tick (55.71 per second).
The damage dealt by it is equal to: (level × 2) + 3 .
Upon entering a new floor, the hairball decreases its level:
• If level 2, reverts to level 1.
• If level 3 or 4, reverts to level 2.
• If level 5, reverts to level 3.

abel.name: Abel
abel.description:
Spawns a familiar that mirrors Isaac's movement and shoots tears towards him that deal 3.5 damage.
When used by Cain or Tainted Cain , the familiar's tears are red and deal 7.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 1.88 times per second.

smb super fan.name: SMB Super Fan
smb super fan.description:
+1 heart container.
+0.3 damage.
+0.2 tears.
+0.2 speed.
+2.5 range.
Fully heals Isaac.

telepathy for dummies.name: Telepathy For Dummies
telepathy for dummies.description: +3 range and homing tears for the current room.

meat.name: MEAT!
meat.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.3 damage.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

3 dollar bill.name: 3 Dollar Bill
3 dollar bill.description:
Grants 2 random tear effects that change every 2-3 seconds.
Can grant the following tear effects:
• 8 Inch Nails 
• 20/20 
• Apple! 
• Ball of Tar 
• Continuum 
• Cricket's Body 
• Dark Matter 
• Dead Eye 
• Death's Touch 
• Euthanasia 
• Explosivo 
• Eye of Belial 
• Fire Mind 
• Holy Light 
• Iron Bar 
• Little Horn 
• Lost Contact 
• Mom's Contacts 
• Mom's Eyeshadow 
• Mom's Perfume 
• Mutant Spider 
• My Reflection 
• Mysterious Liquid 
• Number One 
• Ouija Board 
• Parasitoid 
• Proptosis 
• Pupula Duplex 
• Rubber Cement 
• Sagittarius 
• Scorpio 
• Sinus Infection 
• Speed Ball 
• Spoon Bender 
• The Inner Eye 
• The Parasite 
• The Sad Onion 
• The Wiz 
• Tough Love 
Additionally, it may also grant the following item effects:
• Lucky Foot 
• Magneto

magic 8 ball.name: Magic 8 Ball
magic 8 ball.description:
On pickup Drops a random tarot card.
While held +0.16 shot speed.
+15% chance for the first Planetarium to appear.

squeezy.name: Squeezy
squeezy.description:
On pickup Spawns 2 Soul Hearts .
While held +0.4 tears.

mom s key.name: Mom's Key
mom s key.description:
+2 keys.
If a chest spawns hearts, coins, bombs and/or keys, a second group of said pickups will spawn, effectively doubling the average pickup yield.
Does not affect Red Chests and Old Chests .

box.name: Box
box.description:
Spawns 1 coin, key, bomb, heart, card/rune, pill and trinket.
The pickups can be of any variety (nickels, dimes, soul hearts, double bombs, golden trinkets, etc).

mom s eyeshadow.name: Mom's Eyeshadow
mom s eyeshadow.description:
Gives a chance to shoot charming tears that cause enemies to temporarily fight on Isaac's side.
The chance to fire a charming tear scales with luck, starting at 10% with 0 luck, and maxing out at 100% with 26.95 luck: 1 / (10 - (LuckStat / 3)) .

iron bar.name: Iron Bar
iron bar.description:
+0.3 damage.
Grants a chance to shoot concussive tears that cause enemies to walk around randomly.
The chance to fire concussive tears scales with luck, maxing out at 100% with 27 luck.

midas touch.name: Midas' Touch
midas touch.description:
Isaac can petrify enemies and turn them into gold by touching them.
Enemies killed in this state will drop 1-4 pennies, or 0-1 when held by Keeper or Tainted Keeper .
Touching enemies also deals contact damage to them based on the number of coins Isaac has: 3.5 + 0.2 × coins .
Damage is dealt 2 times per second per enemy.

humbleing bundle.name: Humbleing Bundle
humbleing bundle.description: Provides a 50% chance to transform all bombs, keys, pennies and red hearts into their respective double variants.

fanny pack.name: Fanny Pack
fanny pack.description: Grants a 50% chance to drop a random coin, bomb, key or heart when taking damage.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description:
+1 damage.
+0.5 fire rate.
Detaches Isaac's head from his body, and makes it rotate around his body, allowing it to deal contact damage and block projectiles.
The tears are still shot from Isaac's head, resulting in a non-constant line of fire while standing still.
The head deals 7 damage per tick (52.5 per second).

sharp plug.name: Sharp Plug
sharp plug.description:
Grants the ability to recharge your active item in exchange for self-damage. This can be accomplished by attempting to use an active item when it's not fully charged.
Each charge slot costs one half-heart.
Red hearts are prioritized when sacrificing health.
Cannot deal fatal damage. It can leave Isaac at a minimum of half a heart.

ball of bandages.name: Ball of Bandages
ball of bandages.description:
Spawns an orbital familiar which blocks shots and deals contact damage.
The familiar can be upgraded up to 4 times by obtaining additional Balls of Bandages. Each level has its own characteristics.
Level 1: Blocks projectiles and deals 7 damage per tick (52.5 per second).
Level 2: Gains the ability to shoot tears alongside Isaac, 1.36 times per second, that deal 3.5 damage and can charm enemies.
Level 3: Transforms from an orbital to a follower that chases nearby enemies and deals 5 damage per tick (12.5 per second). It will fire charming tears in the direction Isaac shoots.
Level 4: Increases the size of Bandage Girl and now deals 10 damage per tick (25 per second). Enemies killed by its tears have a chance to drop a full red heart.
Obtaining additional Balls of Bandages will create a new level 1 ball and start the cycle again.
Can drop after defeating a Harbinger.

champion belt.name: Champion Belt
champion belt.description:
+1 damage.
Increases the chance for champion enemies to appear by 15%.
Does not affect the spawn rate of champion bosses.
Does not affect the champion rates in The Void.

gnawed leaf.name: Gnawed Leaf
gnawed leaf.description:
Standing still and not pressing the move or attack buttons for one second will make Isaac invulnerable until the next key press.
Invincibility will be removed by placing bombs or using active items.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Great Gideon.

butt bombs.name: Butt Bombs
butt bombs.description:
+5 bombs.
Bombs cloud up the screen upon detonating, briefly confusing and dealing 10 damage to all enemies in the room.
Butt Bombs heal the following bosses by 25% of their maximum HP: Turdlings, Dingle, Dangle, Brownie and Clog.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Colostomia.

spiderbaby.name: Spiderbaby
spiderbaby.description:
Spawns 3-5 friendly Blue Spiders upon taking damage.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Widow.

lost contact.name: Lost Contact
lost contact.description:
-0.15 shot speed.
Causes Isaac's tears to destroy enemy projectiles upon impact.

guppy s collar.name: Guppy's Collar
guppy s collar.description:
Grants a permanent 50% chance to respawn on death, returning Isaac to the previous room.
Respawning via this item will leave Isaac on half a red heart, or half soul heart if he had no red heart containers.

anemic.name: Anemic
anemic.description:
+1.5 range.
Isaac leaves a trail of red creep upon taking damage.
The creep deals 2 damage per tick (20 per second).

goat head.name: Goat Head
goat head.description:
100% chance for a devil/angel room to spawn after beating a boss, regardless of damage taken.
The devil/angel room won't disappear after leaving.
Even if the boss has been defeated on the current floor, the item will still spawn a devil/angel room.
Does not work on floors that don't normally spawn a devil/angel room.

ceremonial robes.name: Ceremonial Robes
ceremonial robes.description:
+3 Black Hearts.
+1 damage.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Heretic.

mom s wig.name: Mom's Wig
mom s wig.description:
On pickup Heals 1 Red Heart container.
While held Makes Isaac occasionally spawn friendly Blue Spiders while firing tears.
Up to 5 spiders can be spawned at once.
The chance to spawn spiders scales with luck, and goes up to 100% with 10 luck.

placenta.name: Placenta
placenta.description:
On pickup +1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.
While held Grants Isaac a chance to regenerate half a red heart each time the in-game timer hits a new minute (00 seconds).
Can drop from destroying polyps in The Womb.

old bandage.name: Old Bandage
old bandage.description:
+1 empty Red Heart container.
Grants a chance of dropping a red heart after taking damage.
The chance starts at 20% with 0 luck, and goes up to 100% with 80 luck.

sad bombs.name: Sad Bombs
sad bombs.description:
+5 bombs.
Makes Isaac's bombs shoot 10 tears in every direction upon exploding.
The tears deal DamageStat + 25 damage and are affected by any tear modifiers Isaac has, including weapon modifiers.

rubber cement.name: Rubber Cement
rubber cement.description: Makes Isaac's tears bounce off of walls, enemies, bombs and environmental objects.

anti gravity.name: Anti-Gravity
anti gravity.description:
+1 fire rate.
Holding the fire button causes tears to hover in midair. Upon releasing the button, tears are shot in the direction they were originally fired at.
If the button is not released, tears will fire on their own after 3 seconds.

gimpy.name: Gimpy
gimpy.description:
Grants Isaac a chance to spawn a Soul Heart upon taking damage.
The chance to drop a Soul Heart starts at 8% with 0 luck, and goes up to 100% with 46 luck.
Grants enemies a chance to drop a Half Red Heart upon death. This chance depends on the enemies' base health points:
• <10 HP → 1% chance
• 10-29 HP → 5% chance
• 30+ HP → 10% chance
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Sisters Vis.

pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
pyromaniac.description:
+5 bombs.
Makes explosions heal Isaac for half a red heart rather than damaging him.
Grants immunity to damage from fire places or enemy fires, as well as the lake of lava in The Beast fight.
No healing occurs if Isaac has no empty red heart containers.

black lotus.name: Black Lotus
black lotus.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+1 Soul Heart.
+1 Black Heart.

cricket s body.name: Cricket's Body
cricket s body.description:
+0.5 fire rate.
×0.8 range multiplier.
+0.1 tear size.
Isaac's tears split in 4 smaller tears upon hitting something or falling on the ground.
Smaller tears deal half of Isaac's damage and inherit the original tear's status effects.

piggy bank.name: Piggy Bank
piggy bank.description:
+3¢.
Spawns 1-2 Pennies upon taking damage.
When held by Keeper or Tainted Keeper , will spawn 0-1 Pennies instead.

mom s perfume.name: Mom's Perfume
mom s perfume.description:
+0.5 fire rate.
Adds a chance to shoot fear tears that cause enemies to run away from Isaac.
The chance to shoot fear tears scales with luck, starting at 15% with 0 luck, and goes up to 100% with 85 luck.

monstro s lung.name: Monstro's Lung
monstro s lung.description:
×0.23 fire rate multiplier.
Replaces Isaac's tears with a charge-attack that fires a barrage of 14 tears, similarly to Monstro's attack.
Each tear has a random size multiplier between 0.9x and 1.33x, but deals the same amount of damage, equal to Isaac's damage stat.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Monstro II.

ball of tar.name: Ball of Tar
ball of tar.description:
Makes Isaac leave a trail of slowing black creep on the ground.
Adds a chance to shoot slowing tears that reduce the movement speed of enemies and their projectiles.
The chance to shoot slowing tears scales with luck, going up to 100% at 18 luck.

stop watch.name: Stop Watch
stop watch.description:
+0.3 speed.
Slows all enemies' movement and attack speed by 20%.
Slows the music speed by about 10%.

abaddon.name: Abaddon
abaddon.description:
On pickup +1.5 damage.
+0.2 speed.
Converts all red heart containers into black hearts, and adds 2 additional black hearts.
Bone hearts will not be removed, but only emptied.
While held Adds a chance to shoot fear tears that cause enemies to run away from Isaac.
The chance to shoot fear tears scales with luck, starting at 15% with 0 luck, and goes up to 100% with 85 luck.

tiny planet.name: Tiny Planet
tiny planet.description:
+6.5 range.
Grants spectral tears.
Tears now revolve around Isaac at a fixed distance until they hit the ground.
Changing the firing direction will redirect all previously fired tears.

infestation 2.name: Infestation 2
infestation 2.description:
Spawns a friendly Blue Spider upon killing an enemy.
Blue Spiders themselves cannot spawn more Blue Spiders when killing enemies.

e coli.name: E. Coli
e coli.description:
Grants Isaac the ability to turn non-boss enemies into poop by touching them.
Poops spawned this way can yield pickups when destroyed.
Increases the chance of poops dropping hearts.

key piece 1.name: Key Piece 1
key piece 1.description:
+25% chance to spawn an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room when defeating the floor's boss.
Grants a +2.5% chance to convert Red Heart pickups into Eternal Hearts .
Unlocks the door to the Mega Satan fight in The Chest or Dark Room when combined with Key Piece 2 .
Spawns when defeating Uriel if not already in possession.

death s touch.name: Death's Touch
death s touch.description:
+1.5 damage.
-0.3 tears.
×2 tear size.
Grants piercing tears.
Tears are replaced by Death's scythes.

key piece 2.name: Key Piece 2
key piece 2.description:
+25% chance to spawn an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room when defeating the floor's boss.
Grants a +2.5% chance to convert Red Heart pickups into Eternal Hearts .
Unlocks the door to the Mega Satan fight in The Chest or Dark Room when combined with Key Piece 1 .
Spawns when defeating Gabriel if not already in possession.

experimental treatment.name: Experimental Treatment
experimental treatment.description:
Grants 4 random stat increases and 2 random stat decreases.
Each stat can change for a fixed amount:
±1 heart container.
±1 flat damage.
±0.5 fire rate.
±2.5 range.
±0.2 shot speed.
±0.2 speed.
±1 luck.

contract from below.name: Contract from Below
contract from below.description:
Any reward spawned from clearing a room is doubled, but has a 33% chance to be removed completely.
Does not apply to trinkets or Pennies dropped in Greed Mode.

infamy.name: Infamy
infamy.description:
Grants a 50% chance to block any projectile that hits Isaac.
A successful block is indicated by Isaac briefly flashing blue.
Cannot block explosives, lasers, lines of fire from fireballs and projectiles from Big Bony, Coal Boy and Danny.
Even though the mask is only seen on Isaac's face, projectiles can be blocked from any direction.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Mask of Infamy.

trinity shield.name: Trinity Shield
trinity shield.description:
Spawns a shield that stays in front of Isaac's shooting direction and blocks incoming projectiles.
The shield can also be placed diagonally by holding two firing buttons at once.

tech 5.name: Tech.5
tech 5.description:
Grants Isaac a laser with unlimited range and piercing that fires alongside his original tears.
The laser has a 1/6 chance to fire every ~0.07 seconds, firing at an average of 2.5 times per second.
Damage dealt by the laser is equal to Isaac's damage stat.
The laser has a 5% chance to gain a random status effect.

20 20.description:
×0.8 damage multiplier.
Isaac now fires 2 tears at once, one from each eye.
Prevents shot multipliers such as The Inner Eye and Mutant Spider from decreasing tears. This also affects Polyphemus .

blue map.name: Blue Map
blue map.description:
Reveals the locations of Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms on the map.
Its effects appear as an icon next to the map.

bffs.name: BFFS!
bffs.description:
Increases the size of Isaac's familiars by 25%, and improves the effectiveness of most of them.
Doubles the damage of familiars that deal damage through tears or contact damage.
Increases the frequency of pickup-generating familiars dropping pickups.
Grants unique synergies for some familiars. Check the synergies section of familiar pages for more details.

there s options.name: There's Options
there s options.description:
Makes 2 items spawn after defeating a boss instead of one. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.
Two items will also spawn after clearing Boss Rush.
Does not affect mini-boss drops.
Does not affect the Mom fight drops.

hive mind.name: Hive Mind
hive mind.description:
Increases the size and doubles the damage of friendly Blue Spiders, Blue Flies and Locusts.
Makes fly and spider familiars stronger, exactly like BFFS! .

bogo bombs.name: BOGO Bombs
bogo bombs.description: Turns all newly spawned Bombs into Double Bombs .

little baggy.name: Little Baggy
little baggy.description:
On pickup Spawns a random pill.
While held Allows Isaac to carry 2 pills at once. Pills can be cycled through by using the drop button.
Converts all cards into pills. This works retroactively.

starter deck.name: Starter Deck
starter deck.description:
On pickup Spawns a random card/rune.
While held Allows Isaac to carry 2 cards/runes at once.
Replaces all pills with cards. This works retroactively, affecting pills already spawned on the floor.
Cards can be cycled through by using the drop button.

magic scab.name: Magic Scab
magic scab.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+1 luck.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

blood clot.name: Blood Clot
blood clot.description:
Applies the following stats to Isaac's left eye:
+1 flat damage.
+2.75 range.
Can drop from destroying polyps in The Womb.

hot bombs.name: Hot Bombs
hot bombs.description:
+5 bombs.
Grants immunity to damage from fire places.
Makes Isaac's bombs deal contact damage and leave behind a fire that damages enemies and remains there for 10 seconds.
The fire can block 4 shots and/or deal 4 ticks of contact damage before disappearing.
The fire cannot hurt Isaac.
Bombs deal 16 contact damage to enemies. The fire deals 23 damage at full durability, then 17.25, and finally 2x11.5.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Hornfel.

fire mind.name: Fire Mind
fire mind.description:
Grants a fire effect to Isaac's tears, making them set enemies on fire.
Tears have a chance to explode upon impact with an enemy, leaving behind a fire.
The fire deals 23 damage at full durability, then 17.25, and finally 2x11.5.
The explosion can hurt Isaac, but he is immune to the fire that's spawned afterward.
The chance for tears to explode scales with luck, going up to 100% with 13 luck.

missing no.name: Missing No.
missing no.description:
Randomizes Isaac's passive items and stats on pickup and at the start of every floor.
Stats gain a random modifier that does not stack between floors. These modifiers can be either 0 or:
±0.2 speed.
±2.5 range
±0.5 fire rate.
±0.2 shot speed.
±1 flat damage.
±1 luck.

dark matter.name: Dark Matter
dark matter.description:
+1 damage.
Adds a chance to shoot fear tears that cause enemies to run away from Isaac.
The chance to shoot fear tears starts at 33.33% with 0 luck, and goes up to 100% with 20 luck.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Dark One.

black candle.name: Black Candle
black candle.description:
On pickup +1 Black Heart.
+15% chance for a devil/angel room to spawn after defeating the floor's boss.
While held Prevents curses from appearing.
Will immediately remove any curse on the current floor, except for Curse of the Labyrinth! .
Removes teleportation effects from Cursed Eye and Cursed Penny .

proptosis.name: Proptosis
proptosis.description:
+0.5 damage.
×2 tear size.
Makes Isaac's tears shrink in size and lose damage the more time they stay airborne, starting at 3x damage and going down to 0 damage after 0.8 seconds.

missing page 2.name: Missing Page 2
missing page 2.description:
On pickup +1 Black Heart.
While held If taking damage would leave Isaac at exactly one heart, deals 80 damage to every enemy in the room.
Increases the damage dealt by The Necronomicon by +40.

clear rune.name: Clear Rune
clear rune.description:
On pickup Drops a random rune.
On use Copies the effect of Isaac's currently held rune or soul stone.
The recharge time depends on the last copied rune or soul stone. Check the page of each rune or soul stone for more details.

smart fly.name: Smart Fly
smart fly.description:
Spawns a fly familiar that orbits Isaac, blocks projectiles and deals 1.5 damage per tick (6.43 per second).
Upon taking damage in the room, the fly will seek out nearby enemies and attack them, losing the ability to block projectiles.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Min-Min.

juicy sack.name: Juicy Sack
juicy sack.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and leaves a trail of white creep that slows enemies down.
The familiar spawns 1-2 Blue Spiders after every room.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Wretched.

dry baby.name: Dry Baby
dry baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy projectiles. Upon blocking a shot, it has a 10% chance of triggering the The Necronomicon effect.
Can rarely drop from destroying skulls.

robo baby 2 0.name: Robo-Baby 2.0
robo baby 2 0.description:
Spawns a familiar that automatically shoots Technology lasers at enemies when aligned with them, dealing 3.5 damage per shot.
The familiar shoots 3 times per second.
The familiar can be moved around with the shooting buttons.

rotten baby.name: Rotten Baby
rotten baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and spawns friendly Blue Flies when in a room with enemies and holding down a fire button.
The familiar can spawn only one Blue Fly at a time. No additional Blue Flies will be spawned until the first one is killed (minimum delay of 1.36 seconds).
Can drop from destroying polyps in Corpse.

headless baby.name: Headless Baby
headless baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and leaves a trail of damaging red creep on the ground.
The creep deals 2 damage per tick (20 per second).

leech.name: Leech
leech.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and attacks nearby enemies, healing Isaac for half a red heart upon killing an enemy.
The familiar deals 1.5 damage per tick (3.21 per second).
Can spawn from destroying buckets in Downpour or Dross.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Wormwood.

bbf.name: BBF
bbf.description:
Spawns a familiar that flies around the room diagonally and explodes upon contact with an enemy.
The explosion deals 100 damage to all enemies within its blast radius and 10 to the enemy it touched.
After exploding, it will respawn again after 10 seconds, or upon entering a new room.
The explosion can hurt Isaac.

mystery sack.name: Mystery Sack
mystery sack.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drops a heart, coin, bomb or key every 5 or 6 rooms alternatingly.
Pickups can be of any variant.

bob s brain.name: Bob's Brain
bob s brain.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and launches forward while shooting.
If it hits an enemy, it deals 3.5 damage to the enemy and explodes. The explosion deals 100 damage and poisons enemies in its blast radius.
The explosion can hurt Isaac, dealing a full heart of damage.
Upon exploding, the familiar re-appears after a few seconds.

lil brimstone.name: Lil Brimstone
lil brimstone.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and will charge a shot while firing. Releasing it will fire a thin Brimstone laser.
The laser deals 3 damage per tick and can strike an enemy up to 8 times, for a total of 24 damage.

best bud.name: Best Bud
best bud.description:
Upon taking damage, spawns a white attack fly familiar for the duration of the room.
The fly orbits Isaac and deals 10 damage per tick (150 per second).

isaac s heart.name: Isaac's Heart
isaac s heart.description:
Spawns a heart familiar that follows Isaac and tries to position itself in the opposite direction of Isaac's shooting.
Isaac takes damage if the heart is hurt, but Isaac's body becomes immune to damage, excluding interactable objects such as Blood Donation Machines and Devil Beggars .
The heart charges up as Isaac fires. At full charge, upon releasing the fire button, it will knock back nearby enemies and tears, create a small puddle of red creep, and release blood shots in 8 directions that deal 8 damage.
Makes Isaac's body deal contact damage equal to 2x Isaac's damage stat per tick (4x per second).

lil haunt.name: Lil Haunt
lil haunt.description:
Spawns a familiar that chases down enemies, dealing 2 damage per tick (4.29 per second), and inflicting fear.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Haunt.

big fan.name: Big Fan
big fan.description: Spawns a large orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals 2 damage per tick (8.57 per second).

dark bum.name: Dark Bum
dark bum.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and collects red hearts.
For every one and a half red hearts collected, it will spawn one of the following:
• Black Heart (40% chance)
• Card or rune (20% chance)
• Pill (20% chance)
• Blue Spider (10% chance)
• Enemy Spider (10% chance)

sissy longlegs.name: Sissy Longlegs
sissy longlegs.description:
Spawns a familiar that wanders around the room and spawns friendly Blue Spiders once every 10-15 seconds.
Upon contact with an enemy, it will briefly charm them.
Up to 5 Blue Spiders can be spawned at a time.
The spawning timer is active only if there are enemies in the room.

punching bag.name: Punching Bag
punching bag.description:
Spawns a familiar that walks randomly around the room and acts as a decoy, making enemies attack it instead of Isaac if it is closer than him.
The familiar can block enemy projectiles.
Enemies can target the familiar for up to 6 seconds, then they will target Isaac for 6 seconds, etc.

how to jump.name: How to Jump
how to jump.description:
Makes Isaac jump in the direction he's currently moving.
The distance of the jump depends on how fast Isaac was moving.
Isaac can jump over obstacles such as rocks and pits.
Isaac is invulnerable while mid-jump, and cannot interact with pickups and machines.

d10.name: D10
d10.description:
Devolves all monsters in the room into weaker variants of themselves.
Each type of monster has a specific devolve path it takes.
If a monster is at its weakest level, it will mostly transform into a background critter or simply die.
Some enemies can be transformed into obstacles or pickups.

d100.name: D100
d100.description:
Activates most dice-related items in the game at once: D1 , D4 , The D6 , D7 , D8 , D10 , D12 and D20 .
Effectively rerolls the entire run, affecting passive items held by Isaac, pedestal items in the room, stats, monsters, rocks and pickups.

d4.name: D4
d4.description:
Rerolls Isaac's passive items.
Each item is rerolled into an item from the same item pool it was acquired from.

book of secrets.name: Book of Secrets
book of secrets.description:
Activates one of the following map effects: Treasure Map , The Compass or Blue Map , for the duration of the current floor.
Highlights any tinted rocks and rocks with a crawl space in the room.
Cannot give effects that are already activated via any means.
If all of the effects are already active, it will provide X-Ray Vision for the current floor, opening all secret room entrances.
If used on a floor with Curse of the Lost active, it will immediately grant the X-Ray Vision effect.

blank card.name: Blank Card
blank card.description:
Copies the effect of the card currently held by Isaac, without expending the consumable.
The recharge time of the item depends on the last copied card. Check each of the card pages for more details.
If used with ? Card , it will teleport Isaac to the I AM ERROR room, consuming both the card and item in the process.

box of spiders.name: Box of Spiders
box of spiders.description:
Spawns 4-8 friendly Blue Spiders.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Rag Man.

red candle.name: Red Candle
red candle.description:
On use, raises a candle above Isaac's head that can be shot by pressing a fire button. Shooting the candle will spawn a red flame in the chosen direction that can travel over pits, but not obstacles.
The flame deals 23 damage per tick at full size, then 17.25, then 2x11.5, and can hit enemies up to 4 times, for a maximum of 63.25 damage.
The flame can also destroy enemy projectiles, which decreases its size each time, ultimately destroying the flame.
The flame will disappear automatically after 10 seconds.
The flame also destroys enemy shots and shopkeepers.
The flame cannot hurt Isaac.

the jar.name: The Jar
the jar.description:
While held Allows Isaac to store up to 4 extra red hearts in The Jar if his red heart containers are full.
The number of hearts currently stored in The Jar is indicated by a number next to it.
On use Drops all previously stored red hearts on the ground.
When dropped 
Drops all previously stored red hearts on the ground.

flush.name: Flush!
flush.description:
Turns all non-boss monsters in the room into poop, and fills the whole room with water.
Poops can drop pickups.
Instantly kills poop-themed enemies and bosses: Dingle, Dangle, Brownie, Clog, and Turdlings.
Extinguishes all normal and red fire places in the room.
Turns lava-filled pits into solid rock, allowing them to be walked over.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Clog.

satanic bible.name: Satanic Bible
satanic bible.description:
+1 Black Heart.
Forces item pedestals that appear after defeating the floor's boss to be replaced by a deal with the devil, meaning items will be pulled from the Devil Room item pool, and must be paid for with heart containers. This effect lasts for the entire floor Satanic Bible was used on.
Taking a devil deal generated this way affects the chance of getting an angel deal for the rest of the run.
Does not change hardcoded boss drops into devil items, such as Cube of Meat from a Harbinger, however the item will still cost hearts.
Exception from the above rule are the items dropped after the Mom fight.
Does not affect the items dropped in The Void.

head of krampus.name: Head of Krampus
head of krampus.description:
Fires a Brimstone laser in the 4 cardinal directions, similarly to Krampus' attack.
Each beam deals 10 damage over 20 ticks, for a total of 200 damage per use.
Standing close to enemies can cause them to get by more than one beam at once, dealing significantly more damage.
Can drop by defeating Krampus.

butter bean.name: Butter Bean
butter bean.description:
Isaac farts and knocks back nearby enemies and projectiles.
Enemies pushed into walls, obstacles or other enemies take 8 + 2 × CurrentFloor damage.
Reflected projectiles deal 7 damage to enemies.
When a run is started, the game has a 5% chance to replace this item with Wait What? in every item pool. This means both items cannot be available at the same time in a run.

converter.name: Converter
converter.description:
/ -1 Soul/Black Heart.
+1 full Red Heart container.

magic fingers.name: Magic Fingers
magic fingers.description: Consumes 1¢ and damages all enemies for DamageStat × 2 + 10 .

unicorn stump.name: Unicorn Stump
unicorn stump.description:
+0.28 speed and invulnerability for 6 seconds.
Removes the ability to shoot while the effect is active.
Also speeds up the game's music.

taurus.name: Taurus
taurus.description:
-0.3 speed.
When in a room with enemies, Isaac's speed gradually increases at a rate of +0.065 per tick.
Once the speed reaches 2.0, it activates My Little Unicorn for 5 seconds, granting invulnerability, and reseting the speed bonus afterward.
The effect can be activated only once per room.
If Isaac already has 2.0 speed, the effect will activate immediately upon entering a new room.

pandora s box.name: Pandora's Box
pandora s box.description:
Spawns specific pickups or items depending on the floor it was used on:
Floor 
Reward 
Basement I 
2 Soul Hearts 
Basement II 
2 Bombs and 2 Keys 
Caves I 
1 Boss item 
Caves II 
1 Boss item and 2 Soul Hearts 
Depths I 
4 Soul Hearts 
Depths II 
20 Pennies 
Womb I 
2 Boss items 
Womb II 
The Bible 
??? (Blue Womb) 
nothing 
Sheol 
1 Devil Room item and 1 Black Heart 
Cathedral 
1 Angel Room item and 1 Eternal Heart 
Dark Room 
nothing; unlocks Moving Box 
Chest 
1 Penny 
The Void 
nothing 
Home 
Red Key 
The Shop / Ultra Greed 
1 Penny 
Alternate variants of the floor spawn the same pickups as the main floor they're based on (e.g. Dross = Basement).
For Greed Mode, it will always generate its second floor drops for each chapter that is before the Shop.
With Curse of the Labyrinth! , the floor is treated as the first floor of a chapter.
If used while Strange Key is held, the above pickup table is ignored, and it will instead spawn 6 higher quality items from a set of item pools, consuming both items in the process.

aries.name: Aries
aries.description:
+0.25 speed.
Running into enemies at a speed higher than 0.85 will deal 25 damage to them and prevent Isaac from taking contact damage.

cancer.name: Cancer
cancer.description:
+3 Soul Hearts.
Taking damage activates The Wafer effect for the duration of the room, reducing all damage taken to half a heart.

leo.name: Leo
leo.description:
+20% size. Does not affect Isaac's hitbox.
Allows Isaac to destroy obstacles by walking into them.

scorpio.name: Scorpio
scorpio.description: Makes Isaac's tears inflict poison to enemies that deals Isaac's amount of damage to them 2 times.

virgo.name: Virgo
virgo.description:
Grants a chance to trigger Book of Shadows when taking damage, creating a shield that negates damage for 10 seconds.
Converts all pills into positive ones without identifying them.
The chance to activate the shield starts at 10% with 0 luck, going up to 100% with 10 luck.

libra.name: Libra
libra.description:
+6 coins.
+6 bombs.
+6 keys.
Continually balances Isaac's primary stats: damage, range, tears and speed.
Stats are rebalanced in a way that attempts to bring together the highest and lowest stats.
Rebalacing happens all the time, meaning picking up new items, activating cards/pills, etc, will have an effect on all 4 previously mentioned stats.

sagittarius.name: Sagittarius
sagittarius.description:
+0.2 speed.
Grants piercing tears that can pass through enemies.

capricorn.name: Capricorn
capricorn.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.5 damage.
+0.1 speed.
+0.75 range.
+0.5 fire rate.
+1 bomb.
+1 penny.
+1 key.

aquarius.name: Aquarius
aquarius.description:
Makes Isaac leave a trail of blue creep on the ground behind him that damages enemies walking over it.
The creep deals 66% of Isaac's damage 10 times per second.
The creep inherits Isaac's tear effects and changes color based on them.
Chance-based tear effects will also have a chance to be applied whenever enemies walk over the creep.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Lil Blub.

pisces.name: Pisces
pisces.description:
+0.5 fire rate.
+0.12 tear size.
Increases tear knockback.

eve s mascara.name: Eve's Mascara
eve s mascara.description:
×2 damage multiplier.
×0.66 fire rate multiplier.
-0.5 shot speed.
Effectively acts as a 33% increase in DPS.

judas shadow.name: Judas' Shadow
judas shadow.description:
+1 extra life.
Upon death, respawns Isaac as Black Judas with 2 Black Hearts in the most recent non-hostile room.
If playing as Tainted Judas , respawns as that character instead.

maggy s bow.name: Maggy's Bow
maggy s bow.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.
Makes all Red Hearts heal for double their value.

holy mantle.name: Holy Mantle
holy mantle.description:
Once per room, grants a shield that negates the first instance of damage.
The shield is represented with a blue cross icon next to the health bar.
Breaking the shield grants 1 second of invincibility frames.

thunder thighs.name: Thunder Thighs
thunder thighs.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
-0.4 speed.
Allows Isaac to destroy obstacles by walking into them.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Mega Fatty.

strange attractor.name: Strange Attractor
strange attractor.description:
Isaac's tears gain a magnetic effect that attracts monsters, pickups and trinkets towards them.
The magnetic effect becomes stronger as tears travel in the air.

cursed eye.name: Cursed Eye
cursed eye.description:
Grants a charge-attack which fires a tight burst of up to 5 shots.
The charge can be released before fully charged but will shoot fewer tears.
Taking damage while charging (not fully charged) will teleport Isaac into another room.
The teleportation effect can be removed with Black Candle .

mysterious liquid.name: Mysterious Liquid
mysterious liquid.description:
Isaac's tears create a small, short-lasting pool of green creep upon hitting an enemy or falling to the ground.
The creep deals 1 damage per tick to enemies, and can deal a total of 25 damage before disappearing.

gemini.name: Gemini
gemini.description:
Spawns a familiar that is conjoined to Isaac and chases nearby enemies.
The familiar deals 3 damage per tick (6.43 per second).
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Gemini.

cain s other eye.name: Cain's Other Eye
cain s other eye.description:
