Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and copies all of his tear modifiers/stats, but with a 25% reduction in damage, unless playing as Lilith or Tainted Lilith .
The familiar fires randomly in the cardinal directions.

question s only friend.name: ???'s Only Friend
question s only friend.description:
Spawns a familiar that can be controlled with the shooting buttons and deals contact damage to enemies.
The familiar deals 3.5 damage per tick (15 per second).

mongo baby.name: Mongo Baby
mongo baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and copies the tears of his other currently held familiars.
If Isaac has no other familiars, Mongo Baby will fire normal tears that deal 3.5 damage.
The familiar shoots 2.73 times per second.
Only the following familiars can be copied:
• Brother Bobby 
• Demon Baby 
• Freezer Baby 
• Ghost Baby 
• Harlequin Baby 
• Little Gish 
• Little Steven 
• Rainbow Baby 
• Robo-Baby 
• Rotten Baby 
• Sister Maggy

samson s chains.name: Samson's Chains
samson s chains.description:
Attaches a ball and chain to Isaac's ankle that blocks enemy projectiles, deals damage to enemies and destroys obstacles.
The ball deals 5 damage per tick (10.71 per second).

isaac s tears.name: Isaac's Tears
isaac s tears.description:
Fires 8 tears around Isaac that retain Isaac's damage, range, shot speed and most tear effects.
Tears fired from this item gain a +5 flat damage bonus.
The item can only be charged by shooting tears: 1 tear shot will increase the item's charge by one.
Cannot copy tear-replacing items such as Brimstone .

scissors.name: Scissors
scissors.description:
Detaches Isaac's head from his body, turning the head into a stationary familiar that fires tears for the rest of the room.
The head's shooting can be controlled by Isaac.
The body will constantly spew a controllable fountain of blood shots, dealing from 66%-101% of Isaac's tear damage.

undefined.name: Undefined
undefined.description:
Teleports Isaac to the Treasure Room, Secret Room, Super Secret Room or the I AM ERROR room.
The chance to teleport to each room is equal.
There is a very small chance to teleport into a Black Market.
Has no effect when used in the Home level.

breath of life.name: Breath of Life
breath of life.description:
Holding down the active item button will gradually deplete this item's charge bar. As it gets close to 0, Isaac turns blue over time. Once it hits 0, Isaac will become invincible to all outside damage sources. After 1 second, Isaac will begin to take damage if the active item button is still held down.
While invincible, Isaac deals 3.5 contact damage to enemies and beams of light will strike down on enemies touching him, dealing 15 damage.
Touching an enemy or blocking a projectile at the exact moment the invincibility takes place will shoot out beams of light in the 4 cardinal directions that deal 12 damage per tick, or a total of 180 damage.
The item will recharge on its own but cannot be used again until fully charged.

the polaroid.name: The Polaroid
the polaroid.description:
Activates the Book of Shadows effect if Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts at all after taking damage, creating a shield that negates damage for 5 seconds.
Grants entrance to the Chest level after beating Isaac in the Cathedral.
Opens the door in the starting room of Depths II that leads to the Ascent path, getting consumed in the process.
Drops after killing Mom, alongisde The Negative .

the negative.name: The Negative
the negative.description:
+1 damage.
Activates The Necronomicon effect if Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts at all after taking damage, dealing 40 damage to all enemies in the room.
Grants entrance to the Dark Room level after beating Satan in Sheol.
Opens the door in the starting room of Depths II that leads to the Ascent path, getting consumed in the process.
Drops after killing Mom, alongisde The Polaroid .

the ludovico technique.name: The Ludovico Technique
the ludovico technique.description:
+0.2 shot speed.
Replaces Isaac's tears with a single controllable tear that hovers over obstacles and deals constant damage to enemies when held over them.
The movement speed of the tear is determined by the shot speed stat.
The hits per second are determined by the tears stat, maxing out at 30 ticks per second.

soy milk.name: Soy Milk
soy milk.description:
×5.5 fire rate multiplier.
×0.2 damage multiplier.
-0.3 tear size.
Drastically reduces knockback by Isaac's tears.
Automatically charges and fires charged attack items such as Brimstone .

godhead.name: Godhead
godhead.description:
+0.5 damage.
-0.3 tears.
-0.3 shot speed.
Grants homing tears.
Tears gain a damaging aura that deals 2 damage per tick (60 per second).
The size of the aura scales with tear size.

the mind.name: The Mind
the mind.description:
Grants the effects of Blue Map , Treasure Map and The Compass , revealing the entire floor layout, including Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.
Its effects appear as an icon next to the map.

lazarus rags.name: Lazarus' Rags
lazarus rags.description:
+1 extra life.
Upon death, respawns Isaac as Lazarus II in the current room with one less heart container (but no less than 1), the Anemic item and a permanent +0.5 damage.
Traveling to the next floor after the effect has been activated will revert the character into the regular Lazarus form, with his inherent extra life effect.
If playing as Tainted Lazarus , revives as that character instead.

the soul.name: The Soul
the soul.description:
+2 Soul Hearts.
Grants a pulsing blue aura that repels enemies and projectiles. The power of the repel force is random.

dead onion.name: Dead Onion
dead onion.description:
+0.22 tear size.
-1.5 range.
-0.4 shot speed.
Grants piercing and spectral tears.

broken watch.name: Broken Watch
broken watch.description:
In every 4th newly discovered room, enemies and their attacks are slowed down, but has a ~13% chance to speed them up by 40% instead.
The effect is lost upon leaving the room, and not gained back by re-entering it.

the boomerang.name: The Boomerang
the boomerang.description:
On use, Isaac holds the Boomerang in his hand. Pressing a fire button will throw the Boomerang in the chosen direction, and will return it shortly afterward.
The Boomerang can collect pickups along the way and return them to Isaac.
Enemies hit by it will take 2x Isaac's damage and get petrified for ~2 seconds.
The Boomerang will pierce through enemies and obstacles (except key blocks), and can destroy Shopkeepers.

caffeine pill.name: Caffeine Pill
caffeine pill.description:
On pickup Gives a random pill.
While held +0.3 speed.
-10% size.
-4% hitbox size.

blue cap.name: Blue Cap
blue cap.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
+0.7 tears.
-0.16 shot speed.

latch key.name: Latch Key
latch key.description:
+1 Soul Heart.
+1 luck.
Spawns 2 keys, with them having a very small chance to be of different variant.

match book.name: Match Book
match book.description:
+1 Black Heart.
Spawns 3 bombs around Isaac.
Spawns the Match Stick if it hasn't yet been encountered.

a snack.name: A Snack
a snack.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

placebo.name: Placebo
placebo.description:
Copies the effect of Isaac's currently held pill without consuming it.
The recharge time depends on the last used pill. Check the specific pill page for more details.

diplopia.name: Diplopia
diplopia.description:
Duplicates all pickups and item pedestals in the current room.
Cannot duplicate trinkets, the Jera rune or Diplopia itself.
Can be used to take Shop and Devil Room items for free.

wooden nickel.name: Wooden Nickel
wooden nickel.description:
Has a 59% chance to drop a random coin, or more precisely:
• 52% → Penny 
• 6% → Nickel 
• 1% → Dime 
• 41% → nothing

toxic shock.name: Toxic Shock
toxic shock.description:
Poisons all enemies upon entering a room, dealing 2x Isaac's tear damage 2 times, and creating a green fog for the first couple of seconds of the room.
Killing enemies leaves a small, short-lasting pool of green creep that deals 1 damage per tick (30 per second).

mega bean.name: Mega Bean
mega bean.description:
Creates a Mama Mega! explosion in the current room which destroys all obstacles, and blows open all doors.
The explosion deals 100 flat damage to all enemies in the room.
Petrifies all enemies in the room for a couple of seconds.
Deals 5 damage and poisons all enemies near Isaac.
The poison deals Isaac's amount of damage 6 times.

glass cannon.name: Glass Cannon
glass cannon.description:
On use Fires a single high-damage piercing and spectral tear, and knocks back Isaac a bit.
The damage dealt by the tear is equal to (10 * Isaac's damage) + 10 .
While held Upon taking damage, the item transforms into the Broken Glass Cannon , and damages Isaac for an additional 2 full hearts.
When this happens, Isaac gains +1.5 range and leaves a trail of red creep for the rest of the current room.
The damage dealt by Glass Cannon cannot kill Isaac, but will leave him on half a red heart.
The Cannon won't break from self-sacrifice mechanics such as the Blood Donation Machine .

bomber boy.name: Bomber Boy
bomber boy.description:
+5 bombs.
Causes Isaac's bombs to explode in a large cross-shaped blast by adding 2 additional explosions in each cardinal direction.
Each single explosion deals 0.75x its normal damage.
Each successive explosion that hits the same enemy has its damage halved.

crack jacks.name: Crack Jacks
crack jacks.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.
Spawns a random trinket.

car battery.name: Car Battery
car battery.description:
Whenever an active item is used, it is activated 2 times at once.
Some active items cannot be used twice. These include one-time-use and throwable active items.

the wiz.name: The Wiz
the wiz.description:
Makes Isaac's tears fire diagonally from both eyes at the same time.
Gives spectral tears.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Reap Creep.

box of friends.name: Box of Friends
box of friends.description:
Adds a copy of each of Isaac's familiars for the duration of the current room.
If Isaac has no familiars, it will instead spawn a Demon Baby for the duration of the room.
If Isaac already has more than one copy of a familiar, only one additional copy of that familiar will be added.
Cannot copy Blue Flies/Spiders.
Cannot copy familiars with the uniquefamiliar tag.

8 inch nails.name: 8 Inch Nails
8 inch nails.description:
+1.5 damage.
Replaces Isaac's tears with nails that have increased knockback.

incubus.name: Incubus
incubus.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and copies his tears and stats.
The damage dealt by the familiar is reduced by 25% unless playing as Lilith or Tainted Lilith .

fate s reward.name: Fate's Reward
fate s reward.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and copies his damage and tear effects.
The familiar shoots 0.68 times per second.

lil chest.name: Lil Chest
lil chest.description:
Spawns a chest familiar that follows Isaac and has a chance to spawn a random pickup or trinket after clearing a room.
The chances are 25% for a pickup, and 10% for a trinket.

sworn protector.name: Sworn Protector
sworn protector.description:
Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick (52.5 per second).
The familiar attracts enemy shot to itself. If a shot is inside the familiar's range, it can no longer deal damage to Isaac unless it slips out of the range.
The familiar has a chance to drop an Eternal Heart upon blocking 10 shots in one room. Can only happen once per room, unless the room is re-entered.

friend zone.name: Friend Zone
friend zone.description: Spawns a fly familiar that slowly orbits Isaac and deals 3 damage per tick (45 per second).

lost fly.name: Lost Fly
lost fly.description:
Spawns a fly familiar that moves in a straight line upon entering the room, and attaches itself to the first wall or obstacle it comes in contact with. The fly will orbit around said obstacle.
The familiar deals 7 damage per tick (30 per second).
Enemies that are nearby the fly will target the fly instead of Isaac.
If the obstacle that the fly was attached to was destroyed, it will continue moving in the original direction until it finds a new obstacle.

scatter bombs.name: Scatter Bombs
scatter bombs.description:
+5 bombs.
Makes Isaac's bombs split into 4-5 tiny bombs after exploding.
Tiny bombs explode immediately upon landing. They deal half the damage of the original bombs and have a decreased radius.
The bombs inherit most bomb synergies.

epiphora.name: Epiphora
epiphora.description:
Fire rate continuously increases as Isaac shoots in one direction, but accuracy decreases.
When the stat boost is at maximum, it effectively doubles Isaac's fire rate.
Rate of fire returns to normal immediately after Isaac stops shooting, changes shooting direction, or enters an unexplored boss room.

sticky bombs.name: Sticky Bombs
sticky bombs.description:
+5 bombs.
Makes Isaac's bombs stick to enemies and spawn Blue Spiders when they kill the enemy they have stuck to.
Bombs leave slowing white creep upon exploding.

mr dolly.name: Mr. Dolly
mr dolly.description:
+0.7 tears.
+2.5 range.
Spawns 3 of the following hearts when picked up, each having an equal chance to be selected:
• Heart 
• Soul Heart 
• Black Heart

curse of the tower.name: Curse of the Tower
curse of the tower.description:
Spawns 6 Troll Bombs around the center of the room upon taking damage.
The bombs inherit Isaac's bomb synergies.
The effect will not trigger when taking damage from bombs, and self-sacrifice mechanisms, such as Devil Beggars and Blood Donation Machines .

continuum.name: Continuum
continuum.description:
+3 range.
Grants spectral tears.
When tears travel off-screen, they loop back around through the opposite wall.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Mega Maw.

charged baby.name: Charged Baby
charged baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac.
While in an uncleared room, every 30 seconds, it has a 50% chance (100% on its second attempt) to do one of the following:
• Spawn a random battery pickup (max 2 times per room).
• Add a charge to Isaac's active item (max 2 times per room).
• Petrify all enemies in the room for 1.3 seconds.

holy light.name: Holy Light
holy light.description:
Adds a chance to fire glowing blue tears that spawn a damaging beam of light after colliding with an enemy.
Each beam deals 3x Isaac's tear damage and damages enemies in a small radius around it.
The chance to fire a holy tear scales with luck, using the formula: 1 / (11 - LuckStat) , starting at 10% with 0 luck, going up to 50% at 9 luck.

dead eye.name: Dead Eye
dead eye.description:
Each successive tear hit increases Isaac's damage multiplier by 25%, going up to 100% at 4 successive hits.
If a tear misses an enemy, there is a chance for the multiplier to reset. The chance is:
• 20% for the first miss.
• 33% for the second miss.
• 50% for the third miss and beyond.
Isaac's tears glow red and increase in size as the multiplier increases.

restock.name: Restock
restock.description:
Allows infinite purchases from Shops, by spawning a new item/pickup after purchasing one.
Unless playing Greed Mode, each new item/pickup will increase in size after each purchase from the same Shop slot. The price increase varies based on the type of item/pickup:
• Items follow the formula: 15 + n × (n + 1) where n is the number of restocks triggered.
• Everything else follows the formula> (OriginalPrice + n × (n + 1)) / 2 .
The maximum price of an item cannot exceed 99 cents.
A small restock icon will appear under the map while the item is held.

no 2.name: No. 2
no 2.description:
Continuously firing tears for 2.35 seconds causes Isaac to fart (purely visual effect) and drop a Butt Bombs bomb.
Only one bomb can be dropped per firing cycle, requiring Isaac to let go of the firing buttons in order to start a new cycle. Taking damage will interrupt the cycle.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Turdlings.

bursting sack.name: Bursting Sack
bursting sack.description: Prevents certain spider enemies from targeting or dealing contact damage to Isaac, or spawning other enemies.

host hat.name: Host Hat
host hat.description:
Grants immunity to explosions and projectiles falling from above.
Has a 20% chance to block any incoming projectiles. When a projectile is blocked, fires 3 tears that copy Isaac's damage, range and tear effects.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Gate.

pay to play.name: Pay To Play
pay to play.description:
+5 coins.
Most rooms and objects that require a key to open will now require a penny instead.
Affects Shops, Treasure Rooms, Libraries, Locked Chests and Key Blocks.

eden s blessing.name: Eden's Blessing
eden s blessing.description:
+0.7 tears.
Grants a random item at the start of the next run.
Cannot grant items with the noeden tag.
The effect will occur even if the run was unsuccessful, or restarted. Rerolling the item will still grant the effect on the next run.
Does not work if obtained on a seeded run, victory lap, RERUN, during a challenge, or if obtained as a temporary effect, e.g. via Lemegeton or Metronome .
Up to 2 items can be obtained in subsequent runs by picking up multiple copies of the item.

lil gurdy.name: Lil Gurdy
lil gurdy.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and can be launched in the direction Isaac is firing after a short charge-up period, represented with a charge bar next to the familiar.
It can be launched before the charge bar is at maximum, but will do so with a lower velocity.
The familiar deals a fixed amount of damage based on the level of charge and velocity, ranging from ~1 to ~28 damage.
It can bounce off of walls and enemies multiple times.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Gurdy, Gurdy Jr., Mama Gurdy, or Gurglings.

friendly ball.name: Friendly Ball
friendly ball.description:
Grants a throwable ball that will instantly capture any non-boss enemy it hits.
The next time the ball is thrown, it will release the previously captured enemy as a permanently charmed enemy that will follow Isaac between rooms and floors, until it dies.
Walking over the ball after it's been used to capture a monster will instantly recharge it and allow immediate release of the monster.

tear detonator.name: Tear Detonator
tear detonator.description:
Splits all mid-air tears shot from Isaac into 6 more tears in all directions which retain their tear effects, damage and shot speed.
Also affects tears shot from Isaac's familiars.

bumbo.name: Bumbo
bumbo.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and picks up nearby coins. The familiar changes level and behavior based on the number of collected coins.
• Level 1 (0-5 coins): only collects coins to level up.
• Level 2 (6-11 coins): has a chance to drop a random pickup, trinket, chest or pedestal item after clearing a room.
• Level 3 (12-23 coins): fires tears in the same direction as Isaac that deal 3.5 damage and have a chance to drop a coin if they hit an enemy. The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.
• Level 4 (24+ coins): no longer fires tears and instead chases enemies, dealing 2.5 damage per tick (10.71 per second). Will occasionally drop bombs while chasing enemies or coins. Has a chance to drop a pickup or item after each coin collected.

d12.name: D12
d12.description:
Rerolls all obstacles in the room, such as rocks, metal blocks, poops, spikes, fire places, TNT, cobwebs and pillars.
Can reroll into other obstacles, as well as reward plates, red buttons, crawl spaces, trapdoors, golden poop, rainbow poop and tinted rocks.

censer.name: Censer
censer.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and projects a circular aura that slows down enemies and enemy shots within its radius.
Projectiles that once touched the aura will be permanently slowed down.
Does not affect bosses but slows down their shots.

rune bag.name: Rune Bag
rune bag.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drops a random rune or soul stone after clearing 7 or 8 rooms (alternating).

key bum.name: Key Bum
key bum.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and collects keys. It has a 20% chance of dropping a random chest upon collecting a key.
Picking up a Charged Key will make Key Bum spawn a Lil' Battery .
Key Bum cannot pick up Golden Keys .

seraphim.name: Seraphim
seraphim.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and fires homing tears that deal 10 damage and are shot at 75% shot speed.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second.

betrayal.name: Betrayal
betrayal.description:
Allows enemies to hurt each other with projectiles.
When an enemy gets damaged by another enemy, they will attack that enemy instead of Isaac. At this point, the 2 enemies are able to deal contact damage to each other as well.

zodiac.name: Zodiac
zodiac.description: Grants the effects of a random Zodiac item each floor.

serpent s kiss.name: Serpent's Kiss
serpent s kiss.description:
Grants a 15% chance to fire poison tears that deal a total of 2x Isaac's damage.
Inflicts poison on enemies that make contact with Isaac. The poison will tick 6 times, each tick dealing Isaac's amount of damage.
Enemies that were inflicted with poison via contact damage have a 20% chance to drop a Black Heart .

tech x.name: Tech X
tech x.description:
Replaces Isaac's tears with ring-shaped lasers that require a short charge-up before firing.
Shots can be fired before fully charged, which will shoot out smaller rings that deal less damage, scaling from 25% to 100% of Isaac's damage stat.
Isaac's tear stat also slightly affects the damage output.
Rings deal damage 15 times per second. Only the outer line deals damage.
Rings have infinite range and will travel through obstacles and enemies.

marked.name: Marked
marked.description:
+0.7 tears.
+3 range.
When Isaac starts shooting, a controllable crosshair will appear on the floor that Isaac will automatically and continuously shoot at.
The crosshair can be shot at from any direction, rather than the traditional 4-way cardinal direction shooting.
Pressing the drop button will make the crosshair disappear and stop Isaac from shooting until a firing key is pressed again.
Familiars will also shoot towards the crosshair. Throwable familiars will launch themselves towards it automatically.

tractor beam.name: Tractor Beam
tractor beam.description:
+1 fire rate.
+2.5 range.
+0.16 shot speed.
Creates a beam directly in front of Isaac in the direction that his head is facing. Isaac's tears will always travel in the path of the beam.
If Isaac changes direction while shooting, tears that are midair will instantly snap to the beam.
Prevents Isaac from firing tears at an angle by using momentum.

ventricle razor.name: Ventricle Razor
ventricle razor.description:
When used for the first time, creates a blue portal where Isaac is standing. When used for the second time, it creates an orange portal.
Walking into a portal will teleport Isaac to the other one. Portals persist across the entire floor, but will not persist between floors.
Activating the item after 2 portals have been created will replace the older of the 2 portals.
Portals won't persist in rooms that are not part of the floor's layout, such as Devil Rooms, Angel Room, I AM ERROR rooms, Crawl Spaces, Boss Rush, Black Markets, the Mega Satan room, the Hush fight arena, etc.

god s flesh.name: God's Flesh
god s flesh.description:
Grants Isaac a 20% chance to shoot tears that cause enemies to shrink in size and run away from Isaac for 5 seconds.
Shrunk enemies can be crushed and instantly killed by stepping over them.
Enemies will flash white briefly before returning to normal size.
On-death effects of shrunken enemies, such as explosions, shooting projectiles, or summoning enemies, are prevented. This does not apply to champion enemies that have these effects.
Does not affect bosses or mini-bosses.

maw of the void.name: Maw Of The Void
maw of the void.description:
Adds a charge meter that fills up while shooting. Releasing the fire buttons when fully charged (2.35 seconds) creates a black Brimstone ring around Isaac that expands and contracts, dealing damage 15 times per second.
The ring deals Isaac's damage per tick, for a total of 30 times, lasting for 2 seconds.
The ring inherits Isaac's tear effects.

spider mod.name: Spider Mod
spider mod.description:
Spawns a spider familiar that wanders around the room and allows Isaac to see tear damage and health bars of enemies.
The familiar will inflict a random status effect to any enemy it comes in contact with.
Has a chance to drop a Lil' Battery or spawn a Blue Spider upon clearing a room.

spear of destiny.name: Spear Of Destiny
spear of destiny.description:
Gives Isaac a spear that he holds in the direction of his most recent shot.
The spear deals contact damage equal to 2x Isaac's damage per tick, and does so 4.29 times per second.
The spear occasionally inflicts fear to enemies it damages.

explosivo.name: Explosivo
explosivo.description:
Isaac's tears have a chance to stick to enemies and explode after a few seconds, dealing 60 + DamageStat in a small radius.
The explosions can hurt Isaac.
If a sticky tear gets detached from an enemy (if the enemy dies or teleports), the tear will slowly fall to the ground, attaching itself to a new enemy it comes in contact with.

chaos.name: Chaos
chaos.description:
On pickup Drops 1-6 random pickups around Isaac.
While held Causes items to be chosen from random item pools.
Fixed item drops that ignore the current room's item pool are not affected. Such examples include Cube of Meat after defeating a Harbinger, The Small Rock after breaking a Tinted Rock, etc.
Each pool has a different weight (chance to be selected) based on the number of items inside it, with pools having more items being much more likely to be chosen than smaller pools.
Cannot mix up pools between Greed Mode and the normal game.

farting baby.name: Farting Baby
farting baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy projectiles. Has a 10% chance to fart upon blocking a projectile.
There are 3 possible fart effects:
• Charms nearby enemies.
• Poisons nearby enemies, dealing 5 initial damage, and 3.5 per tick of poison.
• Knocks back nearby enemies and projectiles, dealing 6 initial damage, while the deflected tears deal 7 damage.

gb bug.name: GB Bug
gb bug.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and can be launched forward by double-tapping a fire button.
The familiar will reroll the first monster, trinket or pickup it hits when launched, after which it will disappear for the rest of the room.
If it hits an enemy that cannot be rerolled (e.g. a boss), it will deal 8 damage instead.
Cannot reroll items and opened chests.
Any pickup has a 10% chance to be rerolled into a chest. Rerolling a chest has a 28% chance to stay as some kind of a chest.

athame.name: Athame
athame.description:
Killing an enemy has a luck-based chance to spawn a black Brimstone ring that deals Isaac's tear damage to everything it touches, 15 times per second.
Enemies killed by the ring have a chance of spawning another ring, starting at 25% with 0 luck, and going up to 100% with 30 luck.
The ring lasts for 2 seconds and inherits Isaac's tear effects.

d8.name: D8
d8.description:
Rerolls Isaac's damage, tears, range and speed.
Each stat is given a multiplier ranging from 0.5x to 2x, which applies after all other adjustments.
Allows the tears to exceed the default tears cap of 5.

empty vessel.name: Empty Vessel
empty vessel.description:
+2 Black Hearts.
Grants flight when Isaac has no red hearts.
When Isaac has no red hearts, every 40 seconds (when the seconds on the timer hit 00, 20, or 40), while in an active room, activates a shield that negates all damage for 10 seconds.

purity.name: Purity
purity.description:
Grants Isaac an aura that boosts his stats based on color:
• Red : +4 damage.
• Blue : +2 fire rate.
• Yellow : +0.5 speed.
• Orange : +3 range.
Taking damage causes the aura to disappear until another room is entered, randomizing its color.

evil eye.name: Evil Eye
evil eye.description:
Grants a chance to fire a slow-moving eye with infinite range that copies Isaac tears and shoots in the direction that Isaac is firing at.
The chance starts at 3.33% with 0 luck, going up to 10% with 20 luck.

lusty blood.name: Lusty Blood
lusty blood.description:
Isaac gains a damage boost for each enemy killed.
Each kill adds +0.5 damage up to a maximum of +5 damage after 10 kills.
The boost lasts only for the current room.

more options.name: More Options
more options.description: Makes 2 item pedestals spawn in every Treasure Room. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

cambion conception.name: Cambion Conception
cambion conception.description:
Grants Isaac a permanent demonic familiar upon taking damage a certain amount of times. Possible familiars include:
• Dark Bum 
• Demon Baby 
• Incubus 
• Leech 
• Lil Brimstone 
• Succubus 
• Lil Abaddon 
• Twisted Pair 
Can spawn a maximum of 4 familiars. The first 2 each spawn after taking damage 15 times, while the second 2 after taking damage 30 more times. Will max out at 90 hits taken.

crown of light.name: Crown Of Light
crown of light.description:
On pickup +2 Soul Hearts.
When Isaac has no damaged Red Heart containers or Bone Hearts 
×2 damage.
-0.3 shot speed.
Replaces Isaac's tears with blue diamonds.
The crown on Isaac's head will glow blue while the effect is active, and grey when inactive.
Taking damage will disable the effect for the rest of the room.

immaculate conception.name: Immaculate Conception
immaculate conception.description:
Grants a permanent angelic familiar and spawns a Soul Heart for every 15 hearts picked up.
Also works with picking up coins as Keeper or Tainted Keeper .
Possible familiars include:
• Holy Water 
• Guardian Angel 
• Sworn Protector 
• The Relic 
• Seraphim 
Only one of each familiar can spawn. After all of them have spawned, a Soul Heart will continue to drop after every 15 hearts collected.
Any heart pickups count except for Gold Hearts and Blended Hearts .

deep pockets.name: Deep Pockets
deep pockets.description:
Increases the amount of coins Isaac can carry to 999.
If a room would otherwise yield no reward, 1-3 random coins of the same type will spawn.
Spawning coins has no effect in Greed Mode.

succubus.name: Succubus
succubus.description:
Spawns a familiar that bounces around the room and has a dark aura around it that boosts Isaac's damage and deals damage to enemies within its radius.
The aura deals 2.5 damage per tick (10.71 per second).
Boosts Isaac's damage multiplier to ×1.5 while he's standing inside the aura.

teleport 2 0.name: Teleport 2.0
teleport 2 0.description:
Teleports Isaac to an unexplored room.
Prioritizes normal rooms over special rooms. Common special rooms have priority over rarer ones.
When used inside an uncleared room, it will simply reset the room.
The order of rooms that his item will teleport Isaac to is as follows:
• Grave Room (only in the Dark Room).
• Mirror/Minecart Room on Downpour/Mines II.
• Normal rooms.
• Red rooms.
• Boss Room.
• Super Secret Room.
• Shop.
• Treasure Room.
• Planetarium.
• Sacrifice Room.
• Dice Room.
• Library.
• Curse Room.
• Mini-Boss Room.
• Challenge Room.
• Bedroom.
• Arcade.
• Vault.
• Secret Room.
• Devil/Angel Room.
• Ultra Secret Room (Mirrored World only).
• I AM ERROR room (not in Chest, Dark Room or The Void, instead will teleport to the Devil/Angel Room.).

black powder.name: Black Powder
black powder.description:
Leaves a trail of black powder on the ground as Isaac is walking. Using this powder to form a circle will create a pentagram symbol which deals 10 damage per tick (30 per second) to enemies standing inside it.
The pentagram lasts for 4.5 seconds.
Flying enemies are also affected.
Increases the damage and blast radius of Isaac's bombs. Damage is increased to 185.
Causes fire places to explode and deal 20 damage to enemies when extinguished. This explosion cannot hurt Isaac.

fruit cake.name: Fruit Cake
fruit cake.description:
Grants a random item effect to each tear fired by Isaac.
Can also grant the effects of Book of Virtues wisps, such as dropping pickups on kill, teleporting enemies to random locations, transforming enemies into poop or into random wisps.
Possible item effects:
• Anti-Gravity 
• Ball of Bandages (level 4)
• Ball of Tar 
• Brain Worm 
• Bumbo (level 3)
• The Common Cold 
• Compound Fracture 
• Continuum 
• Cricket's Body 
• Cupid's Arrow 
• Euthanasia 
• Explosivo 
• Eye of Belial 
• Eye of Greed (does not make Isaac lose coins)
• Eye of the Occult 
• Fire Mind 
• Flat Stone 
• Flat Worm 
• Glaucoma 
• God's Flesh 
• Godhead 
• Haemolacria 
• Head of the Keeper 
• Holy Light 
• Hook Worm 
• Immaculate Heart 
• Ipecac (no damage boost, poison effect or arcing)
• Iron Bar 
• Jacob's Ladder 
• Knockout Drops 
• Lachryphagy 
• Large Zit 
• Little Horn 
• Lodestone 
• Lost Contact 
• A Lump of Coal 
• Mom's Contacts 
• Mom's Eyeshadow 
• Mom's Perfume 
• Mucormycosis 
• The Mulligan 
• My Reflection (no shot speed modifier)
• Mysterious Liquid 
• Ocular Rift 
• Ouija Board 
• Ouroboros Worm 
• The Parasite 
• Parasitoid 
• Pisces 
• Polyphemus (no damage applied, only piercing shots on overkill)
• Pop! 
• Proptosis (no damage multiplier, effectively only decreases damage dealt)
• Pulse Worm 
• Ring Worm 
• Rotten Tomato 
• Rubber Cement 
• Serpent's Kiss 
• Sinus Infection 
• Spider Bite 
• Spoon Bender 
• Strange Attractor 
• Sulfuric Acid 
• Technology Zero 
• Terra 
• Tiny Planet (no range up)
• Trisagion 
• Uranus 
• Wiggle Worm

glowing hourglass.name: Glowing Hourglass
glowing hourglass.description:
Undoes everything that happened in the current room and returns Isaac to the previous room.
Will restore any health, bombs, coins, keys, cards (except Joker ), runes, pills, items and trinkets.
Will restore devil/angel deal chance if red heart damage has been taken.
Will remove completion marks obtained in the current room.
Will reset even counters, such as the Donation Machine progress.
Can only be used 3 times per floor, after which it will turn into The Hourglass for the rest of the floor.
Can be used to go back to the previous floor if used in the starting room of a new floor. This will immediately turn it into The Hourglass for the entire floor.
Does not affect the chance for a Devil/Angel Room to spawn, or a Void portal appearing, as these chances are seeded per run.
If used in the starting room of a run, teleports Isaac directly to the Home floor.

circle of protection.name: Circle of Protection
circle of protection.description:
Creates a large white halo around Isaac that damages enemies inside it and has a chance to reflect enemy shots.
The halo deals Isaac's amount of damage 2.73 times per second to enemies inside it.
The chance to reflect a shot is 30%. Reflected tears gain a homing effect and deal Isaac's amount of damage.

sack head.name: Sack Head
sack head.description:
On pickup Spawns a random Grab Bag .
While held 10% chance to replace any coin spawned with a Grab Bag.
20% chance to replace any bomb (including troll bombs), key, card, rune or battery with a Grab Bag.
Does not apply to pickups spawned by Isaac, e.g. via IV Bag , and contents of other sacks.
Works retroactively, meaning pickups existing on the floor prior to picking the item up can be converted as well.

obsessed fan.name: Obsessed Fan
obsessed fan.description: Spawns a fly familiar that follows Isaac's movement with a 0.66 second delay, dealing 2 damage per tick (30 per second).

night light.name: Night Light
night light.description:
Creates a shining cone of light in front of Isaac that slows down enemies and their projectiles.
Removes Curse of Darkness! for the current floor. Will not remove it on later floors, but will significantly lessen its visual effect.
The light faces the direction Isaac is moving.
Cannot slow down bosses, but affects their shots.
Enemies that exit the cone of light will lose the slow effect, however projectiles that touch it are permanently affected.

mine crafter.name: Mine Crafter
mine crafter.description:
Spawns a movable TNT barrel that can be exploded by using the item again.
Exploding the TNT barrel does not require for the item to be fully charged.

pjs.name: PJs
pjs.description:
+4 Soul Hearts.
Heals 12 Red Heart containers.

head of the keeper.name: Head of the Keeper
head of the keeper.description:
Turns Isaac's tears into coins that have a 5% chance to drop a Penny when hitting an enemy.
Can spawn by blowing up shopkeepers.

papa fly.name: Papa Fly
papa fly.description:
Spawns a fly familiar that mimics Isaac's movement with a 0.66 second delay and fires tears at nearby enemies.
Tears deal Isaac's amount of damage and are fired once per second.

multidimensional baby.name: Multidimensional Baby
multidimensional baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movement with a 0.66 second delay.
When a friendly tear passes through the familiar, it splits into 2 parallel tears that gain +33% shot speed and +50% tear height which effectively increases range.

glitter bombs.name: Glitter Bombs
glitter bombs.description:
+5 bombs.
Isaac's bombs gain a 63% chance to spawn a random pickup or trinket upon exploding. Each successful spawn decreases the chance by 1% for the rest of the floor.
Bombs also gain a 15% chance to charm random enemies in the room for 5 seconds upon exploding.

my shadow.name: My Shadow
my shadow.description:
Spawns a shadow familiar that follows Isaac's movement on a very brief delay, and spawns friendly Chargers whenever an enemy comes into contact with it.
The Chargers have 20 HP and deal 8.66 damage per tick (18.56 per second). They also deal an additional tick of damage that scales with enemies' max health points, but cannot exceed 3.5.
Chargers last only for the current room.
No more than 16 Chargers can be acquired at once.

jar of flies.name: Jar of Flies
jar of flies.description:
While held Killing an enemy adds a fly to the jar that can hold up to 20 flies at once.
On use Releases Blue Flies equal to the number of flies in the jar.
Kills made by Blue Flies, locusts and shooting familiars do not add flies to the jar.

lil loki.name: Lil Loki
lil loki.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and shoots tears in the 4 cardinal directions.
The familiar shoots 1.36 times per second and deals 3.5 damage.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Lokii.

milk.name: Milk!
milk.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows closely behind Isaac and blocks projectiles.
After blocking 10 projectiles per floor, the glass breaks, spilling milk on the floor and granting Isaac +1 fire rate for the rest of the floor.
The familiar reappears on the next floor.
The puddle of milk is purely cosmetic.

d7.name: D7
d7.description:
Restarts the current room and respawns all enemies.
Pickups may be granted for clearing the room again.
Has no effect in Greed Mode or rooms that had no enemies.
Has no effect in Boss Rooms, Devil Deals, and Angel Rooms.
Respawned champion enemies are unable to drop pickups.

binky.name: Binky
binky.description:
+1 Soul Heart.
+0.75 tears.
-20% size.
-14.7% hitbox size.
Increases the pitch of Isaac's voice.

mega blast.name: Mega Blast
mega blast.description:
Fires a giant Brimstone laser for 15 seconds that persists between rooms and floors.
The beam deals 5x Isaac's damage 15 times per second.
The beam pushes Isaac backward while active.
The beam can be rotated with the shooting buttons.
While the beam is active, Isaac cannot open chests, pick up batteries, items, pills, trinkets or cards/runes, finish the run, or sleep in a bed.

mom s box.name: Mom's Box
mom s box.description:
On use Spawns a random trinket.
While held +1 luck.
Boosts the effects of trinkets. Most often it doubles their original effects, but some trinkets may have special interactions. Check the respective trinket pages for full details about each interaction.
The boosted effects stack with golden trinkets.

kidney stone.name: Kidney Stone
kidney stone.description:
Firing tears will occasionally cause Isaac's head to turn read and charge an attack. Releasing the attack will fire a kidney stone that deals 5x Isaac's damage and pierces enemies, followed by a rapid, inaccurate spray of tears.
When the effect is activated, Isaac gains a temporary x6 fire rate multiplier that decreases rapidly.
The effect occurs immediately when the item is acquired, and every ~25 seconds.
Isaac cannot fire tears normally until the kidney stone effect ends.

dark prince s crown.name: Dark Prince's Crown
dark prince s crown.description:
Increases Isaac's stats when at exactly 1 red heart.
The effect is lost for the rest of the room any time Isaac gains or loses red hearts.
The crown glows red while active, and black when inactive.
The following stat changes are applied when active:
• +2 fire rate.
• +1.5 range.
• +0.2 shot speed.
Has no effect on characters that cannot obtain red hearts or coin hearts.

lead pencil.name: Lead Pencil
lead pencil.description:
After every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a low range burst of 12 tears at once from his right eye.
Tears have a 50% chance to be colored red, but this is purely cosmetic.

apple.name: Apple!
apple.description:
+0.3 tears.
Adds a chance to fire razor blades that deal 4x Isaac's damage.
The chance scales with luck, using the formula: 1 / (15 - LuckStat) , starting at 6.66% with 0 luck, going up to 100% at 14 luck.

linger bean.name: Linger Bean
linger bean.description:
Holding down a fire button for 4 seconds will create a small brown cloud that damages enemies that walk into it.
Shooting tears is not required for the cloud to appear, as long as a fire button is held.
The cloud grows larger over the span of 10 seconds before disappearing. Its damage reduces as it grows larger.
Damage dealt by the cloud starts at ~1.5x Isaac's damage, and is dealt 4.29 times per second. It scales down to ~0.7x Isaac's damage.
Clouds can be moved slightly by shooting at them.

dog tooth.name: Dog Tooth
dog tooth.description:
+0.3 damage.
+0.1 speed.
Upon entering a room that's connected to an undiscovered Secret Room or Super Secret room, a dog howl sound will play.
Upon entering a room that contains an undiscovered Crawl Space, a barking dog sound will play.

dead tooth.name: Dead Tooth
dead tooth.description:
Holding down a fire button creates a green aura around Isaac that poisons nearby enemies, dealing Isaac's amount of damage 2 times.
Shooting tears is not required for the aura to appear, as long as a fire button is held.
Can stack up to 6 ticks at a time.

shard of glass.name: Shard of Glass
shard of glass.description:
Grants a 25% chance to drop a full Red Heart upon taking damage.
Taking damage causes Isaac to bleed and constantly spew out red tears around him. The direction of the bleeding can be influenced by holding a fire button, which will slightly increase its range. It can also be pointed diagonally.
After bleeding for 20 seconds, Isaac will take half a heart of damage, but only red hearts and rotten hearts are affected. This damage also has a 25% chance to drop a red heart.
The damage over time effect will continue every 20 seconds until the bleeding is stopped by receiving any form of red heart or rotten heart healing. Eternal hearts also work.
Bleeding will also stop if Isaac has no more red or rotten hearts, or if the next bit of bleed damage will kill him.
The bleeding effect of the item won't activate if Isaac has no red or rotten hearts.

eye of greed.name: Eye of Greed
eye of greed.description:
After every 20 tears shot, an additional coin tear is fired that turns enemies to gold and petrifies them for a few seconds, similarly to Midas' Touch for the cost of 1¢.
Hitting an enemy with the golden coin will drop a penny, effectively returning the cost unless the shot is missed.
Enemies killed while golden will drop 1-3 coins.
The tear does 1.5 × DamageStat + 10 damage.
If Isaac has no money, the golden tear will still be fired, however it won't deal increased damage. The other effects of it will still apply.

metal plate.name: Metal Plate
metal plate.description:
+1 Soul Heart.
Enemy projectiles have a 25% chance to be reflected off of Isaac, negating damage, but pushing Isaac back a bit.
Reflected tears gain homing and concussive properties, and inherit Isaac's damage and tear effects.

varicose veins.name: Varicose Veins
varicose veins.description:
Upon getting hit, Isaac will fire 10 tears in a circle around him that have a +25 damage increase.
Grants a chance to activate the Anemic effect for 2 seconds upon getting hit, leaving damaging red creep on the ground.

tarot cloth.name: Tarot Cloth
tarot cloth.description:
On pickup Drops a random card.
While held Boosts the effects of certain tarot cards.
Makes cards glow purple while held, even if they gain no boost.
For full details about the boosted effects of each card, please check the respective card pages.

compound fracture.name: Compound Fracture
compound fracture.description:
+1.5 range.
Turns tears into bones that shatter into 1-3 shard upon hitting an obstacle or an enemy, and deal 50% of Isaac's damage.
Tears can split only once.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Pile.

polydactyly.name: Polydactyly
polydactyly.description:
On pickup Spawns a random card, rune or pill.
While held Allows Isaac to carry 2 consumables at the same time (cards, pills, runes, usable objects, etc).

dad s lost coin.name: Dad's Lost Coin
dad s lost coin.description:
On pickup Spawns a Lucky Penny .
While held +2.5 range.

cone head.name: Cone Head
cone head.description:
+1 Soul Heart.
Grants a 20% chance to negate any type of damage dealt to Isaac. This also includes damage from self-sacrifice mechanics, such as Curse Rooms, Blood Donation Machines , Devil Beggars , etc.
Damage negation is indicated by Isaac briefly flashing blue.

midnight snack.name: Midnight Snack
midnight snack.description:
+1 full Red Heart container.
Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

belly button.name: Belly Button
belly button.description:
On pickup Spawns a random trinket.
While held Allows Isaac to carry 2 trinkets at once.

sinus infection.name: Sinus Infection
sinus infection.description:
Grants a 20% chance to fire a booger tear that sticks to enemies and deals damage over time.
Damage is equal to Isaac's damage stat and is dealt once per second.
Boogers last for 10 seconds before disappearing.
Boogers don't inherit Isaac's tear effects, despite them changing appearance.
Boogers will pierce through bombs and fire places.
Multiple boogers can stick to the same enemy, resulting in stackable damage.
If an enemy dies, jumps or teleports while having a booger attached to them, the booger will slowly fall to the ground and can stick to another enemy before disappearing.
The chance to fire booger tears is not affected by luck.

glaucoma.name: Glaucoma
glaucoma.description:
Adds a 5% chance to shoot concussive tears that cause enemies to walk around randomly.
The effect is permanent for normal enemies, and a very longer than usual duration for bosses when compared to other status effects.
Makes the screen darker.
The chance to shoot concussive tears is not affected by luck.

parasitoid.name: Parasitoid
parasitoid.description:
Adds a chance to fire egg sack tears that spawn slowing white creep. If they hit an enemy, 1-2 Blue Flies or Blue Spiders are spawned.
The chance starts at 14.29% with 0 luck, and goes up to 50% with 5 luck.
Egg sack tears have x2 tear height which effectively increases range.

eye of belial.name: Eye of Belial
eye of belial.description:
+1.5 range.
Grants piercing tears that after piercing one enemy, gain double damage, ×1.3 size multiplier and homing properties.

sulfuric acid.name: Sulfuric Acid
sulfuric acid.description:
+0.3 damage.
Adds a 25% chance to shoot acidic tears that destroy obstacles and open doors upon contact.

glyph of balance.name: Glyph of Balance
glyph of balance.description:
+2 Soul Hearts.
Modifies drops from room clears and champion enemies depending on Isaac's held amount of pickups. It prioritizes drops as follows:
• Soul Hearts: when Isaac has no red heart containers and less than 2 soul hearts.
• Full Red Hearts: when Isaac is at half a red heart.
• Keys: when Isaac has no keys.
• Bombs: when Isaac has no bombs.
• Pennies: when Isaac has less than 15 pennies.
• Keys: when Isaac has less than 5 keys.
• Bombs: when Isaac has less than 5 bombs.
• Trinkets: when Isaac has no trinkets, and there are no trinkets on the ground in the room.
• Soul Hearts: when Isaac has less than 6 total heart containers of any kind.
• If none of the above criteria are met, pickups are dropped normally.
Cannot reroll chests.
Glyph of Balance drops can appear if the room would normally yield no reward. An exception to this rule are hearts drops in Hard Mode which have a separate chance of being replaced with an empty drop.
When playing as a character that cannot have red heart containers, red heart and soul heart drops are skipped from the above list.
Having a higher luck stat means that the effects of the Glyph will occur much less frequently, as room drops will often be replaced with chests that are immune to the Glyph.

analog stick.name: Analog Stick
analog stick.description:
+0.35 tears.
Allows tears to be fired diagonally by holding down 2 shooting buttons at the same time.
When using a controller or mouse input, tears can be shot in any direction.

contagion.name: Contagion
contagion.description:
The first enemy killed in each room will release a gas explosion that poisons nearby enemies.
Enemies poisoned by this explosion will also release gas upon death, spreading the effect.
Poisoned enemies don't have to die while poisoned in order for the gas explosion to take place.
The initial gas explosion deals 5 damage, and the poison deals Isaac's tear damage per tick for 6 total ticks.

finger.name: Finger!
finger.description:
Spawns a finger familiar that can be aimed with the shooting buttons in all directions.
The finger fires invisible spectral lasers that deal 10% of Isaac's damage 10 times per second.
The thickness of the invisible laser scales with Isaac's damage, allowing it to deal damage to a wider area.
Whilst not being aimed with the firing buttons, the finger will point to Isaac's movement direction.

shade.name: Shade
shade.description:
Spawns a familiar that mimics Isaac's movement with a 0.66 second delay and deals 5 damage per tick (75 per second).
After the familiar deals over 666 damage, it gets absorbed by Isaac and turns into friendly dark Chargers, similar to those spawned by My Shadow .
This enables Isaac to do contact damage at the same rate Shade used to.

depression.name: Depression
depression.description:
Spawns a cloud familiar that follows Isaac and leaves a trail of damaging blue creep on the ground.
The creep deals 2 damage per tick (20 per second).
Upon touching an enemy, the cloud has a small chance to shoot a damaging Holy Light beam onto the enemy that deals 20 + DamageStat damage per tick and can strike up to 8 times.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Rainmaker.

hushy.name: Hushy
hushy.description:
Spawns a little Hush familiar that bounces diagonally around the room, dealing 2 damage per tick (30 per second).
The familiar stops moving when Isaac is shooting tears, at which point it will block enemy projectiles.
While stationary, the familiar shoots 8 blue projectiles in a circle 0.97 times per second, each dealing 6 damage.

lil monstro.name: Lil Monstro
lil monstro.description:
Spawns a miniature Monstro familiar that follows Isaac. It charges up and fires a cluster of tears similar to Monstro's attack.
The familiar fires 12-14 tears that do 3.5 damage each.
Charge time is equal to 1 second.

king baby.name: King Baby
king baby.description:
Grants a familiar that follows Isaac and is always first in the chain of familiars.
While Isaac is firing tears, the familiar stops moving and glows, causing other familiars to remain stationary as well.
This action will cause shooting familiars to fire at nearby enemies automatically, and throwable familiars to launch themselves at enemies.
When Isaac stops shooting, King Baby rapidly moves back to Isaac.

big chubby.name: Big Chubby
big chubby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and charges across the room when Isaac fires.
The familiar deals 2.7 damage per tick (40.5 per second) when launched, and blocks enemy projectiles.
When launched, the familiar will travel forward until it hits an obstacle or a wall.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating The Matriarch.

plan c.name: Plan C
plan c.description:
Deals 9,999,999 damage to every enemy in the room, but kills Isaac 3 seconds later.
Can be used to kill final bosses that have a quick death animation and finish the run in time before dying.
If used against Delirium or Mother, the death timer is 10 seconds.
Even if Isaac does not manage to reach the ending object in time, some bosses are still technically considered dead before their death animation is finished, thus granting the completion mark if not yet acquired.
List of bosses that cannot be killed in time: Ultra Greedier (only as Tainted Forgotten, The Lost, Tainted Lost, The Forgotten in Soul form and Tainted Jacob in Lost form), The Beast (if used before Isaac starts fighting her directly).
Invlunerable enemies cannot be killed. This includes temporary invulnerability, such as a closed off Host.
No form of invincibility can prevent Isaac from dying after having used Plan C.

d1.name: D1
d1.description:
Duplicates a random pickup in the current room into another pickup of the same type, but the variant can be different, e.g. using it on a Heart can spawn a Soul Heart .
Cannot duplicate Jera .
Opened chests will be duplicated into an unopened copy.
Can be used to duplicate shop pickups into free pickups.

broken glass cannon.name: Broken Glass Cannon
broken glass cannon.description:
This item is acquired when Isaac takes damage while holding Glass Cannon .
It begins with no charges, and turns into the Glass Cannon when fully charged.
For more details about the charged item, please check the Glass Cannon page.

void.name: Void
void.description:
Absorbs and removes all items in the room. Cannot absorb items that require payment.
If an active item is absorbed 
Void will grant the activated ability of that item, allowing it to be activated when Void is used again, simultaneously with all other absorbed active items.
Items are activated in the same order they were absorbed in.
Passive effects of asorbed active items are not gained.
If a passive item is absorbed 
Isaac gains 2 random stat boosts from the following list:
• +1 damage.
• +0.5 fire rate.
• +0.2 speed.
• +0.2 shot speed.
• +1 luck.
• +2.5 range.
Cannot increase stats above their maximum allowed values. If such a stat is chosen, it will effectively do nothing to it.
Items can be absorbed while the pickup animation is playing, i.e. when Isaac holds the item above his head. This can be used to absorb items from shops or devil deals after purchasing them, or during Curse of the Blind.
Absorbing items counts as Isaac taking them, thus will activate Boss Rush, Challenge Rooms and similar mechanics.
If Void is used in a room with linked choice item pedestals, only one of them will be absorbed, while the others will vanish as if Isaac took them.
Using multiple copies of an active item will activate those items' effects equally as many times.
One time use items can still be used only once.

pause.name: Pause
pause.description:
Pauses all enemies and their projectiles in the room until a fire button is pressed or if 30 seconds have passed.
Touching paused enemies will still hurt Isaac.

smelter.name: Smelter
smelter.description:
On use Absorbs Isaac's currently held trinkets and permanently applies their effects to him.
Absorbed trinkets are displayed on the HUD item tracker as regular items.
While held Grants a 2% chance to convert the room clear reward into a trinket.

dataminer.name: Dataminer
dataminer.description:
Rotates every enemy and pickup 90 degrees and moves its sprite up and left without affecting hitboxes.
Adds random tear effects for the current room and distorts the music.
Converts all items in the room into glitched items.
Increases 1 of Isaac's stats and decreases another. Possible stat changes include:
• ±1 damage.
• ±0.5 fire rate.
• ±0.2 speed.
• ±0.2 shot speed.
• ±1 luck.
• ±2.5 range.
If the tear stat reaches a negative number, Isaac's tear stat will instead go to the maximum possible value due to an integer overflow.

clicker.name: Clicker
clicker.description:
Transforms Isaac into a random unlocked character and applies all of the new character's stat changes, and grants his intrinsic passive items (these will be removed upon using Clicker again).
Has a 50% chance to remove the last passive item collected or trinket gulped.
Cannot transform into a character that hasn't been unlocked yet.
Non-tainted characters can only transform into other non-tainted characters, and tainted ones can transform only into tainted ones.
The Clicker can choose the same character, making it seem as no effect took place at all.

compost.name: Compost
compost.description:
Convert all pickups in the current room to Blue Flies or Blue Spiders.
Doubles Isaac's current amount of Blue Flies and Blue Spiders.
If Isaac does not have any Blue Flies or Blue Spiders, spawns one of them.
Does not work on Troll Bombs .

mama mega.name: Mama Mega!
mama mega.description:
Destroys all obstacles, machines, beggars, etc and deals 200 damage to every enemy. This effect is applied upon entering each room for the entire floor.
It will also open up any doors in the rooms, including Secret Room and Super Secret Room entrances.
Will blow up the Donation Machine as well, rendering it unusable for the rest of the run.
Opens the door to Boss Rush and Hush even after the time limit has expired.
If Isaac has a Golden Bomb , it will change Mama Mega's sprite on the HUD to a golden one , and using Mama Mega will consume the Golden Bomb, allowing Mama Mega to be used again.

wait what question.name: Wait What?
wait what question.description:
Isaac farts, knocking back enemies and their shots, and sending out rock waves that deal 10 damage per tick to enemies and break obstacles.
Rock waves can break open door entrances, including Secret Rooms. They can also break open Bomb Chests.
When a run is started, the game has a 5% chance to replace Butter Bean with this item in every item pool. This means both items cannot be available at the same time in a run.

crooked penny.name: Crooked Penny
crooked penny.description:
Has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the current room.
If the effect fails, removes all items and pickups and spawns a single Penny instead.
Can be used to take Shop and Devil Room items for free, if duplicated.

dull razor.name: Dull Razor
dull razor.description:
Hurts Isaac without taking away any health, granting invincibility frames and activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.
Can be used to enter Curse Rooms and open Spiked Chests for free via its invincibility frames.
Cannot be used to exploit Blood Donation Machines , Devil Beggars , etc.
Ignores the shield granted by Holy Mantle and similar items.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description:
Grants the effects of a random item for the current room.
Can grant the effects of any active or passive item, except Glowing Hourglass , Plan C , Breath of Life , Clicker and R Key .
Using the item multiple times in the same room will replace the effect granted previously.
Can trigger the effects of items that haven't been unlocked yet.
Has a reduced chance of selecting Genesis (25%) or Death Certificate (15%).

potato peeler.name: Potato Peeler
potato peeler.description:
+0.2 flat damage.
-1 Red Heart container.
Grants a Cube of Meat , or Ball of Bandages if one is held.
Grants the effects of Anemic for the current room.
Counts as self-damage for the purposes of damage-triggered items.

d infinity.name: D infinity
d infinity.description:
Acts as any die item except for Spindown Dice . Different dice can be cycled through by using the drop key.
Charge time varies and is equal to the one of the last used die.
The icon displayed on the HUD will change based on the selected die.

eden s soul.name: Eden's Soul
eden s soul.description:
Starts with 0 charges when acquired.
When used, spawns 2 random items from the current room's item pool and vanishes from Isaac's inventory.

acid baby.name: Acid Baby
acid baby.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drops a random pill after every 7 cleared rooms. The first pill is dropped after 6 rooms.
Upon using a pill, the familiar poisons all enemies in the room for 6 ticks. Each tick deals damage equal to Isaac's. Enemies also take 10 additional damage.

yo listen.name: YO LISTEN!
yo listen.description:
+1 luck.
Spawns a familiar that sporadically moves around the room.
Upon entering a room with a Secret Room/Super Secret Room entrance, tinted rock or a rock with a Crawl Space underneath, the familiar will fly towards it.
If multiple of the abovementioned are present in the room, the familiar will fly from one to another.
Can sometimes fly over pits, poops or empty tiles, indicating that an unreachable Crawl Space has been generated there.

ghost pepper.name: Ghost Pepper
ghost pepper.description:
Grants a luck-based chance to shoot out a blue fire whilst shooting tears, damaging enemies and destroying shots it comes into contact with.
The fire lasts for a limited time and can pass through obstacles.
Causes Isaac's farts to produce fires.
The fire deals 3-6x Isaac's damage depending on the size of the flame.
The chance of shooting a flame is equal to 1 / (12 - LuckStat) . It starts at 8.33% with 0 luck, going up to 50% with 10 luck.
Flames can be used to destroy Shopkeepers.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description:
Grants damage based on the number of Isaac's fully empty heart containers (half empty containers don't count).
Damage is calculated using the formula: ((2 × MissingHearts) ^ 1.6) × 0.1 .

jacob s ladder.name: Jacob's Ladder
jacob s ladder.description:
Isaac's tears fire a short-ranged spark of electricity in a random direction upon hitting an enemy or an obstacle. When an arc strikes an enemy, it will strike another nearby enemy, chaining up to 4 enemies.
Each spark deals half of Isaac's damage, and has spectral and piercing properties.
Enemies can take damage multiple times from sparks of a single chain. If an enemy takes damage from a tear, it does not take any damage from the chain caused by that tear.
The arcing distance is increased on wet floors, such as Downpour, Dross, Flooded Caves, some rooms in Scarred Womb. This also applies after using Flush! .

euthanasia.name: Euthanasia
euthanasia.description:
Adds a luck-based chance to fire needles that instantly kill non-boss enemies and causes them to burst into 10 tears in all directions.
Needles deal 3x Isaac's damage to bosses and mini-bosses.
Tears from the burst shot can still become needles, but do not retain their insta-kill capabilities. They still do 3x Isaac's damage.
The chance to fire a needle starts at 3.33% with 0 luck, going up to 25% with 15 luck.
Needles can kill otherwise invulnerable enemies, such as Peep's eyes, Death's Heads and Stoneys & Stone Grimaces.

camo undies.name: Camo Undies
camo undies.description:
Upon entering a new room, Isaac becomes camouflaged which causes all non-boss enemies to be confused and walk around randomly. The effect lasts until Isaac shoots.
While camouflaged, Isaac gains +0.5 speed.
Dropping the camouflage deals 15 damage to enemies in a short radius, and briefly grants Isaac +7.5 fire rate and +10.5 damage.
Using an active item or placing a bomb does not cancel the effect.

duality.name: Duality
duality.description:
Causes both a Devil and Angel Room to spawn whenever one would spawn normally after defeating a boss.
Only one of the rooms can be entered, causing the other one to disappear.
Both rooms will spawn, even if a Devil Deal has been taken before.
Sometimes only one room will spawn if the boss room does not have enough space for both.

greed s gullet.name: Greed's Gullet
greed s gullet.description:
+1 empty Red Heart container for every 25 coins Isaac has.
Heart containers are removed if the number of coins reduces below the required amount.
Will grant a total of 4 extra heart containers at 99 coins.
If used by a character that cannot obtain Red Heart Containers, it will instead grant Soul Hearts.
Can kill Isaac if the extra containers are wasted, and the money required for them is spent.
Can exceed the maximum Coin Heart limit of Keeper and Tainted Keeper .
When combined with Deep Pockets and exceeding 100 coins, an extra heart container is given for every 100 coins instead of 25.

eucharist.name: Eucharist
eucharist.description:
100% chance for an Angel Room to spawn after beating a boss, regardless of damage taken.
Prevents Devil Deals from appearing.
The Angel Room will stay open after leaving.
Even if the boss has been defeated on the current floor, the item will still spawn an Angel Room, unless a Devil Deal has previously been visited on the floor.
Does not work on floors that don't normally spawn a devil/angel room.

sack of sacks.name: Sack of Sacks
sack of sacks.description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drops a Grab Bag every 7 or 8 rooms (alternatingly).

large zit.name: Large Zit
large zit.description:
Grants Isaac a chance to fire a creep shot alongside his tears that deals double damage, slows enemies and leaves a short trail of slowing white creep on the ground.
Fires a creep shot in a random direction upon taking damage.
The chance to fire a creep shot is not affected by luck.
Creep shots inherit Isaac's shot speed, but not his tear effects.

little horn.name: Little Horn
little horn.description:
Grants Isaac the ability to deal 3.5 contact damage to enemies, 2 times per second.
Grants a luck-based chance to fire tears that summon Big Horn's hand. The hand will grab and crush any non-boss enemy, killing them instantly.
The hand will attack bosses 3 times, dealing 12 damage per hit.
The hand is able to push enemy projectiles and increase their speed, which may prove more difficult to dodge.
The chance of firing the special tear start at 5% with 0 luck, going up to 20% at 15 luck.
The special tears can kill otherwise invulnerable enemies, such as Peep's eyes, Death's Heads, Stoneys & Stone Grimaces.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Little Horn or Big Horn.

brown nugget.name: Brown Nugget
brown nugget.description:
Spawns a stationary fly familiar that automatically shoots at nearby enemies, dealing 3.5 damage per shot.
The flies are invulnerable and ignored by enemies.
The familiar shoots once per second.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Turdlet.

backstabber.name: Backstabber
backstabber.description:
Tears deal double damage and inflict a bleeding effect when they hit enemies on the back.
Affected enemies bleed for 5 seconds, taking damage at a rate that scales with their movement speed. The faster an enemy is moving, the faster it will take damage. These enemies will also leave behind red creep that damages other enemies for 2 ticks per second at a rapid rate.
An enemy's "back" is considered the opposite of the direction they last moved in.
Enemies that are standing still don't receive the extra damage.
The amount of damage dealt per tick is equal to 2.8 + 0.3 × CurrentFloor .
The effects of Backstabber can also be inflicted by shooting familiars.

poke go.name: Poke Go
poke go.description:
Grants a 20% chance to spawn a friendly enemy upon entering a new room with enemies.
Multiple friendly enemies can spawn at the same time.
Can spawn the following enemies:
• Attack Fly.
• Fat Bat.
• Frowning Gaper.
• One Tooth.
• Pooter.
• Vis.
Can also spawn different friendly variants of the abovementioned enemies.

sharp straw.name: Sharp Straw
sharp straw.description:
Damages all enemies in the room for DamageStat + 0.1 × EnemyMaxHealth .
Each damaged enemy has a 15% chance to drop a Half Red Heart .

mom s razor.name: Mom's Razor
mom s razor.description:
Spawns an orbiting razor familiar that blocks shots and deals contact damage to enemies equal to 20% of Isaac's damage 7.5 times per second (150% per second).
The razor also makes enemies bleed for 5 seconds, taking damage at a rate that scales with their movement speed. The faster an enemy is moving, the faster it will take damage. These enemies will also leave behind red creep that damages other enemies for 2 ticks per second at a rapid rate.
Enemies that are standing still don't receive the extra damage.
The amount of damage dealt per tick is equal to 2.8 + 0.3 × CurrentFloor .

bloodshot eye.name: Bloodshot Eye
bloodshot eye.description:
Spawns an orbital familiar that shoots in the direction it's facing and deals contact damage.
The familiar deals 2 contact damage per tick (15 per second).
Tears shot from the eye deal 3.5 damage and are fired 1.88 times per second when enemies are within its line of sight.

delirious.name: Delirious
delirious.description:
Spawns Delirum in the form of a friendly boss with 75 HP. The boss remains active until it dies, or another one is spawned via the item.
Randomizes the room appearance, similar to the effect caused by Delirium.
The boss takes 1 damage per hit, and 5 damage per explosion.
Spikes, fires, and Red Poops cannot damage the boss.
The boss' health will deteriorate at a rate of 1 HP every 2 seconds, and their color will turn more gray as they reach 1 HP.

angry fly.name: Angry Fly
angry fly.description:
Spawns a fly familiar that orbits around a random enemy in the room, dealing 2 damage per tick (30 per second) to enemies coming into contact with it.
The familiar occasionally makes a lunge towards the enemy it is orbiting, allowing brief contact even with smaller enemies.
When the enemy it was orbiting dies, it starts orbiting a different enemy.
When there are no enemies in the room, it will instead orbit Isaac.

black hole.name: Black Hole
black hole.description:
Throws a black hole that sucks in pickups, enemies and projectiles, and lasts for 6 seconds.
The hole deals 0.4 damage per tick (6 per second) to enemies it's sucking in.
The hole will slightly suck in Isaac but cannot deal damage to him.
Can destroy nearby obstacles in a radius that expands over time.
Cannot destroy room doors.
Cannot suck in stationary or invincible enemies.
Some bosses cannot be sucked in, although they will still take damage from the hole.

bozo.name: Bozo
bozo.description:
+1 Soul Heart.
+0.1 flat damage.
Randomly causes enemies to briefly become charmed or feared.
Taking damage has a 5% chance to spawn a Rainbow Poop.
Picking up the item multiple times will not grant further damage ups.

broken modem.name: Broken Modem
broken modem.description:
Causes enemies, enemy projectiles, tears and pickups to briefly freeze in place at random intervals. The frequency of the effect scales with Isaac's luck.
Frozen enemy shots will disappear.
Has a 25% chance to double room clear rewards. Cannot double chests, pills or cards. However, it can duplicate chests spawned by Options? .
Can be used to create a glitched TMTRAINER item under very specific circumstances. This can happen by using Magneto to immediately open a chest that was duplicated by Options? and contained an item.

mystery gift.name: Mystery Gift
mystery gift.description:
Spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, but has a chance to spawn A Lump of Coal or The Poop instead.
The item spawned depends on Isaac's luck.
• At -10 luck, it has an equal chance to spawn one of the 2 abovementioned items.
• At 0 luck, it has a 83.3% chance to spawn a random item, and 8.3% + 8.3% chance to spawn one of the 2 items.
• At 10 luck, it has a 90.9% chance to spawn a random item, and 4.5% + 4.5% chance to spawn one of the 2 items.

sprinkler.name: Sprinkler
sprinkler.description:
Spawns a stationary sprinkler familiar that rotates and fires tears in 8 directions. The tears copy Isaac's stats and tear effects.
Its rate of fire and rotation depend on Isaac's tears stat.
The familiar does not deal contact damage, but is counted as an obstacle and will block some enemies' movement.

fast bombs.name: Fast Bombs
fast bombs.description:
+7 Bombs.
Allows Isaac to place bombs rapidly with no delay whatsoever.
Removes the knockback between Isaac's bombs.

buddy in a box.name: Buddy in a Box
buddy in a box.description:
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and has a random appearance, tear effects, fire rate, and damage.
The familiar is randomized each floor using the appearance of co-op babies.
Damage dealt by the familiar scales from ~2-6, while tear delay scales from ~12-30.
Tear effects granted are the same used by Fruit Cake .

lil delirium.name: Lil Delirium
lil delirium.description:
Spawns a familiar that transforms into another random familiar every 10 seconds. The familiar will take on a Delirium-like appearance, but otherwise has the same stats and behavior as the non-Delirium counterpart.
Can transform into the following familiars:
• Acid Baby 
• BBF 
• Big Chubby 
• Bob's Brain 
• Cube of Meat (level 4)
• Dry Baby 
• Farting Baby 
• Fruity Plum 
• Headless Baby 
• Hushy 
• Incubus 
• Isaac's Head 
• Lil Brimstone 
• Lil Gurdy 
• Lil Haunt 
• Lil Loki 
• Lil Monstro 
• Little Chubby 
• Little Gish 
• Robo-Baby 2.0 
• Seraphim 
Can transform into the same familiar multiple times in a row, thus keeping the same form for more than 10 seconds.
The familiar can damage Isaac when taking the form of BBF or Bob's Brain .

jumper cables.name: Jumper Cables
jumper cables.description: Grants +1 active item charge for every 15 enemies killed.

coupon.name: Coupon
coupon.description:
While held Guarantees a random item or pickup in the Shop to sell at half price.
On use Allows a random item in the current room that costs money or hearts to be taken for free.
Using the Coupon in Greed Mode or when holding Restock does not restock the taken item or consumable.
Can be obtained from Shopkeepers.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.description:
Upon use, for the next 3 seconds, any enemy shots that come near Isaac are held in place. They're fired back as tears when the item charge is depleted, dealing 3.5 damage to enemies.
Also pushes away enemies while active.

moving box.name: Moving Box
moving box.description:
If the box is empty 
Picks up items and pickups in the room and stores them.
It can store up to 10 things at once, picked randomly.
Cannot be used to steal items from Shops or Devil Rooms.
Using it in a Challenge Room or Boss Rush will take the items, but start the challenge.
If used in a room with choice pedestals, only one of them will be packed up, while the others will disappear.
A Moving Box that is holding stuff cannot be packed within another box.
If the box is not empty 
Places all previously stored things in the current room.

technology zero.name: Technology Zero
technology zero.description:
Connects Isaac's tears with electricity beams that deal damage to enemies equal to 30% of Isaac's damage, 15 times per second.
A single tear can only generate one connection, but other tears can still make connections with it.
Each of Isaac's tears can connect with allied tears, including those of shooting familiars.

leprosy.name: Leprosy
leprosy.description:
Upon taking damage, Isaac gains a body part orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick (30 per second).
A maximum of 3 body parts can be active at once.
Each body part can deal up to 30 ticks of damage and/or block 3 shots before getting destroyed.
Has a 1% chance of being dropped upon defeating Fistula.

7 seals.name: 7 Seals
7 seals.description:
Spawns a random Harbinger familiar that deals contact damage to enemies and periodically spawns locusts if Isaac currently does not have any.
The familiar changes appearance and behavior every 10 seconds based on the 5 Harbingers:
• Famine: wanders around the room leaving slowing black creep on the ground. He deals 0.5 damage per tick (2.14 per second), and spawns yellow locusts every 3 seconds that deal 2x Isaac's damage and slow enemies down.
• Pestilence: wanders around the room leaving green creep on the ground that deals 1 damage per tick (30 per second). He deals 0.5 damage per tick (2.14 per second), and spawns green locusts every 3 seconds that deal 2x Isaac's damage and poison enemies, dealing Isaac's damage over time.
• War: chases enemies and has increased speed. He deals 1.5 damage per tick (6.43 per second), and spawns red locusts every 5 seconds that detonate upon impact with enemies, dealing 2x Isaac's damage on impact, and 60 for the explosion. The explosion can hurt Isaac, and synergizes with his bomb modifiers.
• Death: chases enemies dealing 1.5 damage per tick (6.43 per second), and spawns black locusts every 3 seconds that deal 4x Isaac's damage.
• Conquest: wanders around the room dealing 0.5 damage per tick (2.14 per second), and spawns 2 white locusts every 2 second that deal 2x Isaac's damage.

mr me.name: Mr. ME!
mr me.description:
Summons a ghost that follows Isaac and a controllable blue crosshair on the ground. The crosshair disappears after a few seconds, and the ghost will act based on what the crosshair's was targeting:
• Item / Pickup / Trinket / Chest / Red Chest / Spiked Chest / Mega Chest: brings it to Isaac.
• Shop or Devil Deal Item/Pickup: has a 50/50 chance to either grab the item for free or fail, making the ghost disappear and do nothing.
• Locked Chest / Eternal Chest / Bomb Chest: opens it for free.
• Button/Reward Plate: presses the button.
• Enemy: attacks it until it dies or can no longer be targeted due to a form change or similar cause. Deals 3 damage per tick (9 per second).
• Door: opens the door, even if locked. Can open the door to Mega Satan, Hush (only exit) and Boss Rush (only exit).
• Secret Room entrance: blows up and opens the entrance.
• Destructible obstacle / Shopkeeper / Machine / Beggar: explodes and destroys it.
• Nothing: interacts with the object closest to Isaac.

angelic prism.name: Angelic Prism
angelic prism.description:
Spawns an orbital familiar with a large radius that splits any tear it passes through it into 4 multi-colored tears.
Also works for familiars' tears.

pop.name: Pop!
pop.description:
Isaac's tears become eyeballs that bounce off of each other and are no longer limited by range, but instead dissipate when they stop moving or hit an enemy or obstacle.
Eyeball tears fall to the ground after bouncing off of each other 8 times.

death s list.name: Death's List
death s list.description:
Upon entering a room, a skull appears over an enemy that spawned first. Killing the enemy will cause the skull to move to a different enemy.
